column3: Ma e kaka wangʼeyo gima hera en; Kristo nochiwonwa ngimane. Wan bende onego wachiw ngimawa ni owetewa.
Kane Sap Pasaka okayo machiegni, Yesu nongʼeyo ni sane osechopo mar wuok e pinyni mondo odog ir Wuoro. Kaka nosehero joge owuon mane ni e pinyni, koro noikore nyisogi herane matut mogik.
Koso gin jomage mane okechogo kuom higni piero angʼwen? Donge nokecho gi joma notimo richo ma ringregi nodongʼ e thim kosetho?
Kaka nyithindo mawinjo wach, kik ulu kit gombo maricho mane uluwo chon kane pod udak e kia.
Nimar Nyasaye osemiyo ji duto obedo joma otamore winje mondo okech ji duto.

Ne awinjo gima chalo gi dwol e dier gik mangima angʼwen-go kawacho niya, “Koro gorogoro mar ngano ibiro ngʼiew gi nengo maromre gi chudo michulo jatich e odiechiengʼ achiel kendo gorogoro adek mar shairi bende chal gi chudono, to nengo mo zeituni gi divai kik medi.”
Bolreuru e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye eka obiro otingʼou malo.
Nikech oseketo chiengʼ mobiro ngʼadoe bura ne piny duto gadiera, kokalo kuom ngʼat moseyiero. Bende osenyiso ji malongʼo ni obiro timo mano ni ji duto, nikech nochiere oa kuom joma otho.”
Jolweny nokado osimbo mar kudho, mi gisidhone kendo negiketo e wiye. Ne girwakone kandho makwar,
Kuom mano daher mondo mon ma chwogi otho matindo okendi, mondo ginywol nyithindo, kendo girit utegi mondo kik gimi jasigu thuolo mar ketho nying joma oyie.
Yie koda ka awacho ni an ei Wuora kendo Wuora ni e iya; to ka ok kamano, to yie kuom ranyisi gi honni ma asebedo ka atimo.
Eka tho gi Piny Joma otho nowiti e ataro mar mach. Ataro mar mach en e tho mar ariyo.

Ka Kristo ne nyalo timo kamano, to mano ne nyalo chune ni otho nyadi mangʼeny nyaka aa chakruok piny. To koro osefwenyore dichiel kendo mogik e ndalo mogikni mondo ochiw ringre owuon kaka misango magolo richo.
kendo nonano kodgi e thim kuom higni piero angʼwen, kata obedo ni timbegi ne richo kamano.
Kuom mano, jowetena, ka uchokoru kaachiel mondo uchiem, to ngʼato ka ngʼato mondo orit nyawadgi.
Ne angʼicho kane oyawo kido mar auchiel. Piny noyiengni matek. Mi wangʼ chiengʼ nolokore maratengʼ ti, machal gi lep gugru mirwako e kuyo molos gi yie diel, dwe bende nolokore makwar ka remo;
Mon mane nigi yie nochiernegi jogi manosetho mi gikawogi ka gingima. Jomoko kuomgi kata ne isando malich to nodagi ni kik wegi thuolo, nikech negigeno ni nochiergi e ngima maber moloyo.

To Paulo nowachone askechego niya, “Ne gichwadowa e lela ka ok gikwongo giyalowa, mi giterowa e od twech kata obedo ni wan jo-Rumi. To koro sani gidwaro golowa e od twech nangʼo lingʼ-lingʼ? Ooyo, gibi abiya mondo gin giwegi ema gigolwa.”
Chikego wacho niya, “Kik iterri, kik ineki, kik ikwal, kik igomb gir wadu,” kod chike mamoko duto moriw e chik achiel mawacho niya, “Her wadu kaka iherori iwuon.”
Ngʼato ka ngʼato man-gi genoni pwodhore owuon mondo osik koler mana kaka en bende oler.
Nimar ei chunya maiye amor gi chik Nyasaye;
Beduru mamor pile kuom Ruoth, kendo amedo jiwou ni beduru mamor!
Eka nalokora mondo ane ngʼat mane wuoyo koda. Kane alokora ne aneno rachungi teyni abiriyo mag dhahabu,
Gin jomage ma nokwongʼorenegi ni ok ginidonji e kar yweyone, ka ok gin joma notamore winjo wachne?
Ji duto mane obiro motelona ne gin jokwoge kendo jomecho, to rombe ne ok owinjogi.
To un wasumbini winjuru ruodhiu kendo migiuru luor. Kik uluor mana ruodhi mabeyo ma ok kwiny kodu, to luoruru koda mago makwiny kodu.
Eka negichiwo joneno mag miriambo, mane ojimbo wach kuome kawacho niya, “Ngʼatni osiko wuoyo marach kuom kama ler, kendo kuom Chik.
Magi duto oa kuom Nyasaye, mane ogolo sigu mane ni e kindwa kode kotimowa osiepene kuom Kristo, kendo omiyowa tich mar loko wasike osiepene:
Owetena, kawuru jonabi mane owuoyo e nying Ruoth kaka ranyisi mar bedo gi horuok e kinde chandruok.
To ngʼato ka ngʼato maluongo nying Jehova Nyasaye noresi!’”
Kagiwacho niya, “Amin! Pak gi duongʼ kod rieko gi erokamano gi luor kod teko gi nyalo obed ni Nyasachwa, nyaka chiengʼ. Amin!”
Ber maru ok onego onenre mana kuom gik mulichogo dendu ma oko: kaka kado wich gi rwako bangli mag dhahabu kod lewni ma nengogi tek.
Kuom mano kik wiyi kuodi kuom timo nend Ruodhwa kata nenda an Jatichne motwe. To kuom teko mar Nyasaye yie mondo osandi koda nikech Injili,
Apwodhora nikech gin, mondo omi gin bende gipwodhreni gi adiera.
Omiyo chiew! Mondo ijiw gima pod odongʼno kapok otho chuth, nimar timbeni ayudo korem e nyim Nyasaye.
Kamano bende Malaika mar adek noolo tape e aore gi sokni mag pi kendo pigegi ne olokore remo.
ma kuome waseyude kuom yie yor chopo e ngʼwono makoro wan-goni. Bende wail kuom geno mar duongʼ mar Nyasaye.
Ngʼeuru malongʼo ni onge ngʼat ma terore, kata ma timbene richo, kata ma jawuoro, to ngʼat matimo gigi lamo nyiseche manono, omiyo ok noyud gweth mar pinyruoth Kristo gi Nyasaye.
Yie ema nomiyo Ibrahim owinjo luong Nyasaye mi owuok odhi e piny mokia, mane biro bedo mare bangʼe achien. Nowuok awuoka modhi kata obedo ni nokia kuma nodhiye kamano.
Weuru mer gi kongʼo nikech mano kelo anjawo. Kar timo kamano to upongʼ gi Roho Maler.
Ji mathoth noluw kit ngimagi mag anjawo makelo wichkuot, kendo ginimi ji nocha yo mar adiera.
Nikech kuome waduto koro wan gi yo mwachopogo ir Wuoro, kuom Roho achiel.
To kuom joma ok jo-Yahudi moyie, wasendikonegi kuom gimane buchwa ongʼado ni kik gicham chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono, kik ucham remo, gi ring jamni mode, kendo ni kik giterre.”
Eka Petro nowachone Anania niya, “Ere kaka iseweyone Satan thuolo e chunyi momiyo isewuondo Roho Maler, ka idongʼ gi bath pesa mane iyudo kuom puodho?
Koro ok wanachak wabed kaka nyithindo mayom yom, ma bagni koni gi koni nikech yamb puonj mayoreyore, ma dhano molal siekogo mondo giwuondwago kendo gigolwago oko e yie madiera.

Donge ungʼeyo ni joma timo timbe maricho ok noyud gweth mar pinyruoth Nyasaye? Kik ngʼato wuondu! Ngʼeuru ni jochode kata joma lamo nyiseche manono, kata joma terore, kata chwo ma terore gi chwo wetegi,
Kik wawe mak wachokore kaachiel, kaka jomoko oseweyo timo, to wajiwreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato, kendo umed timo kamano to moloyo ka uneno ka Chiengʼ Ruoth medo sudo machiegni.
Emomiyo, neguru dwaro duto mag ringruok manie ngimau, kaka: terruok, dwanyruok, gombo, tim ma ok ler, kod wuoro, ma en lamo nyiseche manono.
To nikech wan jo-odiechiengʼ, wabeduru gi ritruok ka warwakore gi yie kod hera kaka law akor mar lweny; kendo gi geno mar warruok kaka ogut lweny.
Nikech Nyasaye ne ok omiyowa chuny mar bedo ngoche, to nomiyowa chuny mar bedo gi teko, gihera kod ritruok.
To ngʼat mawacho ni ongʼeye to ok tim gima odwaro en ja-miriambo kendo adiera onge e chunye.
to kare beduru gi paro achiel, gihera achiel kod chuny achiel mondo umi chunya opongʼ gi mor.
Kane giwinjo mano, ne gitemo mondo gimake, to onge ngʼama notemo mule gi lwete, nikech kindene ne pok ochopo.
Chikgi mondo gitim maber, ka gipongʼ gi mwandu mag timbe mabeyo kendo gibed mangʼwon ka giikore pogo mwandugi ne ji mochando gik ma gin-go.
Negidwoke niya, “Ka dine bed ni ok en jaketho, to dine ok wakele e nyimi ka.”

Ngʼat mokawo odiechiengʼ moro ni duongʼ moloyo machielo timo kamano mondo omi Ruoth duongʼ. Ngʼat machamo ringʼo bende chiemo kamiyo Ruoth duongʼ, nikech ogoyo erokamano ne Nyasaye. Kamano bende, ngʼat ma ok chiem bende ok chiem kuom miyo Ruoth duongʼ, kendo ogoyo erokamano ne Nyasaye.
Beduru mamor kuom geno, kutimo sinani e sand muyudo, kendo ulamo ma ok uywe.
Bangʼe nogolo chik ni jatend jolweny mondo orit Paulo, ka omiye thuolo moromo, kendo mondo kik otam osiepene miye kony moro amora mane onyalo dwaro.
Hera umo weche duto, osiko oyie ayieya, osiko ogeno agena, kendo osiko odhil adhila.
Muma wacho niya, “Ne ayie emomiyo ne awuoyo.” Gi chuny mar yie machalre, wan bende wayie kendo wawuoyo,
Bende wakwayou, jowetewa, mondo usiem joma budho abudha, kendo mondo ujiw joma luor, kendo ukony joma yomyom. Horeuru mos gi ji duto.
Eka malaika mar abich noolo tape ewi kom duongʼ mar ondiek malichno, to pinyruodhe nolokore mudho. Ji nokayo lewgi nikech rem malit mane gin-go
Kwe gi ngʼwono obed ni ji duto moyie luwo chikni, kendo kata ni Israel mar Nyasaye.
Ne osepuonje kuom yor Ruoth, kendo nopuonjo wach Yesu koketo chunye, kata obedo ni nongʼeyo mana batiso mar Johana kende.
Omiyo gimoro amora mutimo, bed ni uchiemo kata umetho, to timgiuru duto mondo Nyasaye oyud duongʼ.

Un to Roho mane Kristo omiyou osewirou, omiyo ok uchando ngʼat mapuonjou. To kaka Roho museyudono puonjou kuom gik moko duto, kendo dak ma Roho odak godo e iwu en adiera ma ok miriambo mana kaka osepuonjouno, sikuru kuome.
Mana kaka ringruok maonge muya otho, e kaka yie maonge tim bende otho.
Kane osewacho mano, nokawo makati mi ogoyo ni Nyasaye erokamano e nyimgi giduto. Eka nongʼingo makatino mochako chiemo.
To owinjore wandiknegi mondo wanyisgi ni kik gicham chiemo motimgo misango ne nyiseche manono, kik giterre, kik gicham ring jamni mode kendo kik gicham remo.
Eka Paulo nowachone niya, “Nyasaye biro goyi, in kor ot mobuk matarni! Owinjore ingʼadna bura kaluwore gi Chik, to in iwuon ema iketho chik ka iwacho ni jogi mondo ogoya!”
Mano emomiyo koro onge bura kuom joma oyie kuom Kristo Yesu,
Nikech Nyasaye ne ok oyierowa mondo wayud kum mar mirimbe mager, to noyierowa mondo wayud warruok kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo.
kendo nowuog oko mondo owuond ogendini duto mag tunge angʼwen mag piny, ma gin Gog gi Magog, kendo nochokgi kaachiel mondo gidhi e lweny. To kar kwan-gi romre gi kwoyo manie dho nam.
Kamano e kaka jomoko kuomu ne chalo. To ne olwoku mi opwodhu, mi oketu udoko joma kare e nying Ruoth Yesu Kristo, kendo kuom Roho mar Nyasachwa.
Mano emomiyo asandora kama. To wiya ok kuodi, nikech angʼeyo Jal ma aseyie kuome, kendo angʼeyo chutho ni onyalo rito ngimana gi chunya ma asechiwone nyaka ndalo nogono.
To lamuru kuom Roho kinde duto gi kit lamo duto, kendo ka ukwayo. Ka un gima e paro, to beduru mokichore kusiko ukwayo kinde duto ni jomaler duto.
An Paulo gi Sila kod Timotheo, Wandikonu un kanisa mar jo-Thesalonika, man kuom Nyasaye Wuoro kod Ruoth Yesu Kristo: Ngʼwono gi kwe moa kuom Nyasaye Wuoro kod Ruoth Yesu Kristo obed kodu.
Muolo maru mondo onenre ni ji duto nikech Ruoth chiegni duogo.
Nikech ka usiko uchamo makatini kendo umadho kikombeni, to unyiso tho mar Ruoth nyaka chop oduogi.
Nikech lamo molam kuom yie biro kelo chang ni jatuo, mi Ruoth mi oa malo. To ka osetimo richo to nowene.
Adwokone Nyasaye erokamano ma atiyone gi paro maler maonge bura, mana kaka kwerena bende notiyone, ka apari odiechiengʼ gotieno e lemona mapile.
Negiluongo gode gi lwendini kagiwacho niya, “Podhuru kuomwa mondo uumwa kupandowa ni wangʼ Jal mobet e kom duongʼno, kendo ne mirimb Nyarombo!

Ngʼat man-gi it mondo owinj gima Roho wacho ni kanisa. Ngʼat molocho abiro miyo manna moko mopandi. Bende abiro miye kidi marachar mondikie nying manyien maonge ngʼat mongʼeyo makmana ngʼat monwangʼe.

Nikech bedo gi gombo mar yudo gik malangʼ, jopuonj mag miriambogo noywau gi sigendini magiseloso mag miriambo malombo ji; mondo gimau mwandu. To kum margi mane oiknegi chakre chon ritogi, kendo kethruokgi ok nodeki ma ok ochoponegi.
Kuom mano Nyasaye ooronigi teko maduongʼ marundo pachgi mondo omi giyie gi weche mag miriambo,
Mana kaka ondiki niya, “Nying Nyasaye iyanyo e dier joma ok jo-Yahudi nikech un.”
Mana kaka Janes gi Jambre nokedo gi Musa e kaka jogi bende kedo gi adiera, gin joma pachgi osekethore kendo jogo ma osekwedi kaluwore gi yie.
Joma ahero ema akwero kendo akumo. Omiyo bed ja-adiera kendo ilok chunyi iwe timo richo.
Emomiyo, kaka koro oseketwa kare kuom yie, wan gi kwe gi Nyasaye kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo,
Rit ngimani gi weche mipuonjo maber. Tim kinda kodgi mak iweyogi, nikech ka itimo kamano eka inires ngimani iwuon kaachiel gi ngima joma winjo weche mipuonjo.

Kuom kinde mangʼeny ne adhi e sinagogi ka sinagogi mondo akawgi akumgi, kendo natemo chunogi mondo giyany Nyasaye. Nikech chunya ne rach kodgi ni nyaka atiekgi, ne adhi nyaka e mier ma oko mondo asandgi.
Timbe mag ringruok nenore ratiro, gin kaka: chode, timbe mochido, anjawo,
Omiyo ngʼat mochwoyo kata ngʼat moolo pi ok en gimoro, makmana Nyasaye, mamiyo gik moko dongo.
Kuom mano, ok uremo mich moro amora mar Roho kuritogo odiechiengʼ ma Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo nofwenyree.
Eka ne awinjo dwol moro moa e polo ka wuo ka pi aora maringo matek kendo ka mor mar polo. Dwolno mane awinjo ne chalo gi jo-thumbe mag nyatiti magoyo nyatiti.
Jonabi duto owuoyo kuome ni ngʼato angʼata moyie kuome yudo weruok mar richo e nyinge.”
Ne joma osetimo kinda kuom timo maber, ka gidwaro duongʼ kod luor, kod gik ma ok tho, enomi ngima mochwere.
An Johana, Andiko ni kanise abiriyo manie piny Asia: Ngʼwono kod kwe obednu koa kuom Jal mantie, Jal mane nitie kendo Jal mabiro betie, kendo koa kuom Roho abiriyo manie nyim kom duongʼne,
Paulo nowachonegi niya, “Batiso mar Johana ne en mar lokruok weyo richo. Nonyiso ji mondo oyie kuom Jal mane biro bangʼe, ma en Yesu.”
to ka en kamano, to kare Ruoth ongʼeyo kaka dores joma omiye luor kuom tembe ma giyudo kendo ongʼeyo kaka okano joma richo ni kum chiengʼ Bura, ka gidhi nyime kod kumgi.
To kar timo kamano, ne gigombo piny maber moloyo mano mane giseweyo. Ne gigombo polo. Emomiyo Nyasaye wiye ok kuodi kiluonge ni Nyasachgi, nikech oseikonegi dala.
Bed mabor chuth gi sigendini manono mag piny maonge tiende to moloyo tiegri ibed molony e luoro Nyasaye.
Ne giwuotho mi gikwako piny duto, kendo negilworo kambi mar jo-Nyasaye, dala maduongʼ ma Nyasaye ohero. To mach ne oa e polo mobiro e piny kendo nowangʼogi motiekogi.
Kuom mano, nogolo chik mondo obatisgi e nying Yesu Kristo. Bangʼ mano ne gikwayo Petro mondo omed bet kodgi kuom ndalo moko.
Bende iwacho chutho ni in jatend muofni, kendo ni in e ler mar joma ni e mudho;
To ma e gima Kristo owuon nosingore ni nomiwa, ma en ngima mochwere.
To rieko moa e polo ok chal kamano. Mokwongo oler, kendo ohero kwe, odembore, owinjo wach, opongʼ gi kech kod olembe mabeyo, ok odew wangʼ, kendo oonge miganga.
Wuoro ohero Wuowi, kendo oseketo gik moko duto e lwete.
Ruoth ok odeko kuom chopo singruokne, kaka jomoko paro. Un ema oweyonu thuolo mondo ulokru, nikech ohore mos ka odwaro ni kik ngʼato lal kata achiel, to odwaro mondo ji duto olokre owe richogi.
Dobedo maberna moloyo ka ji duto obedo kaka an, to kata kamano, ngʼato ka ngʼato nigi michne ma Nyasaye omiye, ngʼat moro nigi michni, to ngʼat machielo bende nigi mich machielo.
Luwuru hera, kendo dwaruru mondo ubed gi mich mag chuny, to moloyo beduru johul wach.
Nikech Nyasaye mane owacho niya, “Ler mondo orieny koa e mudho” ema osemiyo lerne omenyo chunywa, momiyowa ler mar ngʼeyo duongʼ Nyasaye mineno kuom Yesu Kristo.
E kindeno ja-Yahudi moro monywol Aleksandria, ma nyinge Apolo, nobiro Efeso. Ne en gi ngʼeyo matut e puonj mag Muma.
Mano emomiyo Yesu bende nogur oko mar dala mondo opwodh joge odok maler gi rembe owuon.
Koro magi e gik monego ipuonji. Jiw ji kendo ikwergi gi teko duto. Kik iwene ngʼato thuolo mondo ochayi.
Nyasaye nonyiso hera moherowago kama: Ne ooro Wuode ma miderma e piny mondo wabed mangima kuome.
“Wuora, adwaro ni joma isemiya obed koda kama antie, kendo ni gine duongʼna, ma en duongʼno misemiya nikech ne ihera kapok nochwe piny.
kethruok kod masira ni kamoro amora ma gidhiyoe,
Kuom mano kaka koro wan gi Jadolo Maduongʼ mosedhi nyaka e polo, ma en Yesu Wuod Nyasaye, wamakuru yie mwahulo matek.
Nikech ne oyudo luor kod duongʼ kuom Nyasaye Wuoro kane dwol obirone moa e Duongʼ Mamalo Moloyo, kawacho niya, “Ma e Wuoda mahero, en ema chunya mor kode!”
Magi duto gin tich mar Roho achiel machalre, kendo ochiwogi ni ngʼato ka ngʼato kaka ohero.

Kendo malaika mar angʼwen nogoyo turumbetene, mi achiel kuom adek mar chiengʼ gi achiel kuom adek mar dwe, kod mar sulwe, notimo mudho, to achiel kuom adek mar odiechiengʼ gi otieno bende notimo mudho.
Eka jo-Yunani duto nochako toyo mirimbgi kuom Sosthene, jaduongʼ sinagogi, mi gichako goye e nyim jobura; kendo Galio ne ok odewogi kata matin.
Ne gitemo make kendo, to nopusore e lwetgi.
Emomiyo chunywa ok nyosre. Kata obedo ni ringrewa ma oko rumo kamano, to chunywa iloko manyien odiechiengʼ kodiechiengʼ.
Eka Maria nokawo mo mangʼwe ngʼar kendo ma nengone tek, manyalo romo nus lita, mowirogo tiende Yesu, bangʼe oyweyo tiendene gi yie wiye. Mi ot nopongʼ gi tik mangʼwe ngʼar mar mono.
Yie mane en-gono ema nomiyo odhi odak e piny ma wendo, mane osingne. Nodak e hema mana kaka Isaka kod Jakobo bende ne jodak, mi gidoko weg singruok kaachiel kode.
Jowetena, riwreuru gi ji mamoko kungʼiyo maber joma kit wuodh ngimagi chal gi ranyisi mane uneno kuomwa.
Kawuru tingʼ mag jowadu, nikech kutimo kamano eka uchopo chik Kristo.
Koro nenore malongʼo ni ngʼato doko ngʼat makare kuom gima otimo, to ok kuom yie kende.
Koro wanyalo wacho angʼo? Wanyalo wacho ni Nyasaye ok jangʼad bura makare koso? Ok nyal bet kamano ngangʼ!
Rwakuru ngʼama yie mare yomyom ma ok umino kode wach kuom weche ma pod en-go gi kiawa.
Eka lweny nochakore e polo. Mikael gi malaike mage nokedo gi thuol malichno, to thuol mangʼongono gi malaike mage bende nokedo kodgi.
“Kaponi iu owangʼ, to kik utim richo.” Kik uwe chiengʼ podhi ka pod un gi ich wangʼ
Kik uchul richo kar richo, kata ayany kar ayany kar timo kamano to gwedhuru agwedha, nikech mano omiyo noluongou, mondo uyud gweth.
Jal mane oora ni koda kendo pok oweya kenda, nimar atimo gik malongʼone kinde duto.”
Emomiyo nyonuru piny motegno, kutweyo nungou gi kamba mar adiera, kendo kurwako tim makare ka gige lweny mag akor,

Tiend wach mopandi mar sulwe abiriyo mane ineno e lweta ma korachwich, kod rachungi teyni abiriyogo mag dhahabu ema: Sulwe abiriyogo e malaike mag kanise abiriyo, to rachungi teyni abiriyo gin e kanise abiriyogo.
To waneno mana Yesu mane odwok piny moloyo malaike, makoro sani osidhne osimbo mar duongʼ kod luor, nikech noneno lit mar tho. Yesu nobilo tho ni wan duto kuom ngʼwono mar Nyasaye.
nikech Nyasaye owuon ema tiyo e chunyu mondo omi umanye kendo utim dwarone maber.
Asenyisou wachni mondo morna obed eiu kendo mondo mor maru obed moromo chuth.
An Paulo jaote Kristo Yesu kaluwore gi Chik Nyasaye ma Jawarwa, kod Kristo Yesu, ma en genowa,

Adwaro bende ni mon orwakre gi lewni mowinjore ka gibidhore kendo giritore maber, to rwakruokgi kik bed mana mar kado wich kata mar dhahabu kata mar rwako tigo ma nengone tek kata lewni ma nengogi tek,
Omiyo noloso del gi piende molir olir, kendo noriembo ji duto oko ei hekalu, kod rombe gi dhok bende. Nokeyo pesa mag jowil pesa, kendo noloko mesnigi ataro.
Mano timore nikech wan chwech Nyasaye, manochweyo kuom Kristo Yesu mondo otim timbe mabeyo, ma Nyasaye owuon ema nosechano chon mondo watim.
Osiepena mahero, kik uluor ka uyudo sand mawangʼou ka mach kuparo ni gimoro magalagala ema timorenu.
Wabeduru moil kendo mamor ahinya kendo wamiyeuru duongʼ! Nikech kinde kisera mar Nyarombo osechopo, kendo chiege oseikne.
Kawuru ogudu motegno mar warruok kod ligangla mar Roho ma en wach Nyasaye.
Noneno ka ja-Misri moro goyo ja-Israel wadgi, omiyo ne odhi okonye mi nogoyo ja-Misrino monego.
To un, jowetena, kik uol gi timo maber.
Beduru motangʼ, kendo chunguru motegno e yie maru, bende beduru jochir kendo motegno.
Ne utingʼo malo hemb Molek kod sulwe mar nyasachu ma Refan ma gin, nyiseche manono mane uloso mondo ulam. Omiyo abiro darou mi ateru e piny twech mabor mayombo Babulon.’
Kuom mano, jowetewa, chunguru motegno, kendo makuru matek puonj mane wapuonjou gi dhowa kata gi barupewa.
Nyasaye ema oseikonwa chenro machalo kama, kendo osemiyowa Roho kaka singo, masingo gima biro.
Mon mondo opuonjre kolingʼ kendo koyie winjo wach.
Kik iyie gi ketho modonjnego jaduongʼ kanisa kaonge joneno ariyo kata adek.
Mosreuru, uduto ngʼato gi ngʼato, gi yogruok maler. Kanise duto mag Kristo omosou.

Ginibuk wigi gi buru ka gigoyo nduru niya, “ ‘Mano kaka lit! Mano kaka lit, yaye dala maduongʼ, kama ji duto mane nigi yiedhi e nam, nobedo joma omewo nikech mwandune. Mano kaka osekethe kendo otieke chutho mana kuom sa achiel kende!’
Mano kaka hera ma Wuoro oherowago duongʼ kuom luongowa ni nyithind Nyasaye. Kendo mano e gima wan! Gimomiyo piny, ok ongʼeyowa en nikech piny ne ok ongʼeye.
Un jomatindo bende chiwuru luor ni jomadongo. Rwakreuru gi muolo e kindu ngʼato gi ngʼato, nikech Muma wacho niya, “Nyasaye osin gi josunga to ochiwo ngʼwono ne joma muol.”
Ooyo, ok kamano kata matin! Nyasaye nyaka bed ja-adiera, to ji duto jo-miriambo, mana kaka ondiki niya, “Mondo ibedi kare ka iwuoyo kendo ilochi ka ingʼadona bura.”
Kendo Damaski bende osebire ka jodolo madongo omiye teko mar mako ji duto maluongo nyingi.”

To jonabi mag miriambo bende ne nitie e kind oganda Nyasaye e ndalo machon, mana kaka jopuonj mag miriambo bende biro bedo e dieru. Gibiro kelonu puonj mag miriambo lingʼ-lingʼ mondo giketh ji, ka gikwedo nyaka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto mane owarogi kendo mano nomi gitiekre kendgi piyo piyo nono!
Wachni nomiyo jo-Yahudi oramo ni nyaka ginege, nimar negineno ni ok Sabato kende ema noketho, to bende noluongo Nyasaye ni Wuon-gi, manyiso ni ne oketore ni orom gi Nyasaye.
Agoyonu erokamano nikech usiko upara e yore duto, kendo nikech umako puonj duto mane amiyou.
Daudi bende nowuoyo kuome niya, “ ‘Ne aneno Jehova Nyasaye e nyima ndalo duto. Nikech ka entie e lweta korachwich, to onge gima nyalo yienga.
Nikech osenywolu nywol manyien, ok gi kodhi ma towo, to gi kodhi ma ok tow, gi wach Nyasaye mangima kendo mochwere.
Emomiyo ngʼato ka ngʼato mondo ohul richone kendo olam ni nyawadgi, mondo eka uyud chang. Lamo mar ngʼat makare nigi teko kendo timo tich.
Awachonu adier ni ngʼama oyie kuoma nigi ngima mochwere.
Ok abi weyou ka nyithi kiye; abiro biro iru.
Nitie ber mangʼeny! Mokwongo, gin ema ne omigi wechegi mag Nyasaye.
Wasumbini, winjuru ruodhiu mondikou e piny-ka kumiyogi duongʼ gi luor, kendo kutiyo gi chuny ma thuolo, mana ka gima uwinjo Kristo.
Koso ichayo ngʼwonone mogundho, ber mare kod horuokne? Donge ingʼeyo ni Nyasaye ngʼwononi mondo omiyi thuolo mar lokruok mondo iwe richo?
Ma e chir ma wan-go ka wadhi e nyim Nyasaye ni ka wakwaye gimoro mowinjore gi dwache to owinjowa.
Mad Nyasach geno opongʼu gi mor kod kwe mogundho ka ugeno kuome, mondo omi upongʼ gi geno malach kuom teko mar Roho Maler.
To kama negigure Yesuno ne nitie puodho moro, kendo ei puodhono ne nitie bur manyien mapok oike ngʼato.

To ne omak ondiek malichno kaachiel gi janabi mar miriambo, mane osetimo timbe honni e nyinge. Honnigo ema ne osewuondogo joma ne oketnegi kido mar ondiek malichno kendo negilamo gima ket kode. Ondiek malichno gi Janabi mar miriambo ne owiti kangima e ataro mar mach maliel mager.
To bende Muma wacho niya, “Ka jasiki odenyo, to miye chiemo; ka riyo oloye, to miye gimoro omodhi, ka itimo kamano, ibiro choko chuk mach maliel e wiye.”

Wach Kristo mondo odagi e chunyu gi nyak duto mokelo, kupuonjoru kendo usiemoru ngʼato gi ngʼato gi rieko duto, kendo kupako Nyasaye gi wende zaburi kwero wende kitabu kod wende chuny ka ugoyo ni Nyasaye erokamano e chunyu.
Un chwo, heruru mondu, kendo kik ubednegi mager.

To ka ngʼama oyie moro odak gi mon ma chwogi otho e dalane, onego okonygi en owuon mondo kik kanisa bed gi tingʼ mapek mar ritogi, eka kanisa okony mon ma chwogi otho mamoko man kendgi chuth maonge ngʼama nyalo konyogi.
To ma e gima Nyasaye osewacho: Nyasaye osemiyowa ngima mochwere kendo ngimano ni kuom wuode.
Ngʼat man-gi Wuowi nigi ngima; to ngʼat maonge gi Wuod Nyasaye onge gi ngima.
Omiyo ka Wuowi ema omiyo ubedo thuolo, to ubiro bedo thuolo chutho.
Emomiyo akwayou ni kik chunyu nyosre nikech sand ma ayudo nikech un, ngʼeuru ni sandruokna ema miyou duongʼ.
Nimar joma kamago ok ti ne Kristo Ruodhwa, to gitiyo mana ne igi giwegi. Giwuoyo gi weche mayom ka giolo ji mondo giwuond chunje joma pachgi thany thany.
Gipongʼ gi kit timbe mamono duto, gi richo, gi wuoro kod timbe mobam. Bende gipongʼ gi ich lit, gi nek, gi dhawo, gi wuond kod himruok. Gin jokuoth,
Rit mwandu maber mosemiyi, kirite gi teko mar Roho Maler modak kuomwa.
Ngʼat ma ochwoyo kuom ringruok, noka kethruok, to ngʼat ma ochwoyo kuom Roho, noka ngima mochwere.
Kik watem Ruoth, kaka moko kuomgi notimo, mi thuonde nonegogi.
Wiye ok tek, ok odwar mare kende, iye ok wangʼ piyo kendo ok omak sadha.
Negirwako gige lweny mag akor machalo gi akor mar nyinyo, to bwombegi ne goyo koko mana ka farese mangʼeny kendo ka geche miywayo kadhi e lweny.
Ka dine ok abiro mi awuoyo kodgi, to dine ok buch richo oloyogi. To koro, onge wach ma ginyalo umogo richogi.
Beduru gi rieko kuom joma odak e dieru kutiyo gi thuolo muyudo e yo maber.
Nimar wangʼeyo ni ngimawa machon nogur kode mondo ringruok mar richo okethi, kendo kik koro wabed wasumbini mag richo,
Kaka wanyalo ngʼeyo pogruok manie kind nyithind Nyasaye gi nyithind Satan ema: Ngʼat ma ok tim gima kare kendo ma ok ohero owadgi ok en nyathi Nyasaye.
Kuom mano, paro moket kuom ringruok mon gi Nyasaye. Ok oyie bet e bwo loch mar chik Nyasaye, kendo ok onyal timo kamano.
Emomiyo chunya mor kendo lewa yot; ringra bende nobed gi geno,
Ooyo! Awacho ni misango ma jopiny makia Nyasaye timo, gitimo ni jochiende, to ok ni Nyasaye. To ok adwar mondo ubedi e lalruok achiel gi jochiende.
Kanisa mane ni Antiokia notingʼo jonabi gi jopuonj. Ne gin Barnaba gi Simeon miluongo ni Ratengʼ, gi Lukio ja-Kurene, gi Saulo kod Manaen mane odongo gi Herode ma ruoth.
Kik uyie ngʼato wuondu gi weche manono, nikech gik ma kamago ema miyo Nyasaye olo mirimbe kuom joma ok winj wachne.
Jogi nyaka kwer mondo olingʼ, nikech giketho mier mangʼeny ka gipuonjo gik ma ok owinjore gipuonji; kendo gitimo kamano mana mondo giyudie ohala ma ok nikare.
Nikech nongʼeyo ngʼat mane biro ndhoge, mano emomiyo nowachonegi ni ok giler giduto.
Yesu nomedo wachonegi niya, “Adier, adier, awachonu ni ngʼama ok donji e abich rombe koluwo dhorangach, to odonjo koluwo yo machielo, en jakuo kendo jamecho.
Gisebaro giweyo yo makare mi girwenyo ka giluwo yor Balaam wuod Beor, mane ohero misach richo.
Eka joma ok jo-Yahudi kod jo-Yahudi, kaachiel gi jotendgi nochano lingʼ-lingʼ mondo gisand joote kendo gichielgi gi kite.

Nopenje mar adek niya, “Simon wuod Johana, bende ihera?” Petro nokuyo nikech Yesu nopenje mar adek niya, “Bende ihera?” Nodwoke niya, “Ruoth, in ingʼeyo gik moko duto; ingʼeyo ni aheri.” Yesu nowachone niya, “Kare pidh romba.
To gimoro amora ma ok ler, kata ngʼato matimo gik makwero, kata mariambo, ok nodonjie, makmana jogo ma nying-gi ondiki e kitap Nyarombo mar ngima kende.

Dhakono norwakore gi lewni maralik gi makwar, kendo nolichore gi dhahabu kod kite mabeyo ma nengogi tek gi lulu. To notingʼo kikombe mar dhahabu e lwete, mopongʼ gi gik makwero kod timbe mochido mag terruokne.
To moloyo ni mago duto, rwakreuru gihera, mariwo wechegi duto mi giwinjre kaka gimoro achiel.
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Sa osechopo mondo Wuod Dhano omi duongʼ.
In miwacho ni ji kik terre, dibed ni to iterori? In ma ichayo nyiseche manono, dibed ni in to ikwelo ei hekalu mag nyiseche manonogo?
To richo nokawo thuolo mane chik okelo mopidho kit gombo mayoreyore kuoma nimar ka chik onge to richo otho.
Abiro resi e lwet jou kendo kuom joma ok jo-Yahudi. Aori irgi

Nikech wan bende chon ne wan joma ofuwo ma ok winj wach kendo wasumbini mag kit gombo gi mor mayoreyore mag ringruok. Ngimawa mapile nopongʼ gi ichlit gi nyiego; ka ji mon kodwa kendo wan bende onge winjruok e kindwa.
Achiki e nyim Nyasaye kendo e nyim Kristo Yesu, kaachiel gi malaika moyier, ni mondo ilu puonjgi adimba ma ok idewo wangʼ ngʼato kendo ma ok idok kor ngʼato angʼata.
Kuom mano, kik koro uyie chir mane un-go lalnu, nikech obiro kelonu pok maduongʼ.
To ongʼere ni joma omi tich mar rito nyaka bed jo-adiera.
Petro nomedo dak Jopa e od janyongʼ piende moro miluongo ni Simon kuom kinde mogwarore.
Donge ungʼeyo ni un uwegi un e hekalu mar Nyasaye, kendo ni Roho mar Nyasaye odak eiu?
Kuom mano owetena, nikech koro wan gi chir mar donjo e Kama Ler Moloyo kuom remb Yesu,
Yesu nowachonegi kendo niya, “Abiro dhi aweyou, kendo ubiro manya, to unutho mana e richou. Kuma adhiye ok unyal bire.”
Kuom mano, kaka un jo-Nyasaye moyiero, maler kendo mogeno, rwakreuru gi kech, gi miwafu, gi bolruok, gi muolo, kod kinda.
Ngʼato angʼata matiyona nyaka luwa, kendo kama antie ema jatichna bende nobedie. Ngʼat matiyona Wuora biro miyo duongʼ.
Nyaka obed ngʼat morito ode maber kendo nyaka one ni nyithinde winjo wachne gi luor mowinjore.
Kuom mano jiwreuru kendo gerreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato mana kaka utimono.
Wach mane uwinjo nyaka aa chakruok ema: Nyaka waherreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato.
Nikech chandruok mantie sani, aparo ni ber mondo usik kaka uchal.
Ne nitie ngʼat moro ma ja-Farisai ma nyinge Nikodemo, ne en achiel kuom jobuch jo-Yahudi.
Kamano bende Rahab dhako mane jachode nokwan kaka ngʼama kare kuom gima notimo kane orwako jombetre kendo okonyogi tony gi yo machielo.
Kata kamano mon noyud resruok e yor nywolo nyithindo, ka gisiko e yie kod hera gi ngima maler kendo modimbore.
Nyasach jo-Israel noyiero kwerewa kendo nomiyo ginyaa e thuolo mane gidak Misri. Nyasaye notelonigi kagologi Misri kuno gi tekone maduongʼ;
Nyasaye owuon mongʼeyo chuny ji, nonyiso ni oyie kodgi, ka nomiyogi Roho Maler, mana kaka wan bende nosemiyowa.
Nikech Jal mane owacho niya, “Kik iterri,” ema nowacho bende niya, “Kik ineki.” Kaponi ok iterri to nek to ineko to isedoko jaketh chik.
Amiyogi ngima mochwere, kendo ok ginilal ngangʼ, bende onge ngʼama nyalo kawogi kagologi e lweta.
Nyasach kwe biro miyo unyon Satan gi tiendu. Ngʼwono mar Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo obed kodu.
gitimo gik manenore ni gin joma oluoro Nyasaye to ngimagi nyiso ni gionge gima luoro Nyasaye kelo. In to nyaka ipogri chuth gi joma kamago.
e kaka ei Kristo, waloso ringruok achiel, kata obedo ni wangʼeny, kendo ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomwa ni e achiel gi jowetene mamoko duto.
Wachni en wach madiera. Kendo adwaro ni ijiw wechegi mondo joma oseketo genogi kuom Nyasaye otangʼ mondo gichiwre mar timo gik mabeyo. Gigi gin gik malongʼo chuth, kendo kelo konyruok ne ji duto.
Omiyo Ndiko nochopo kare, mawacho niya, “Ibrahim noyie kuom Nyasaye, kendo mano nomiyo Nyasaye okwane kaka ngʼama kare.” Kuom mano, Ibrahim ne iluongo ni osiep Nyasaye.
Jowetena, kaka un joma oyie kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo ma en Ruodh duongʼ, kik udew wangʼ ji.
“Dwondgi chalo liete mapok oum; lewgi olony e wacho miriambo.” “Kwiri mar thuond fu ni e lewgi.”
Kamano bende, chwo onego oher mondgi mana kaka gihero dendgi giwegi. Ngʼat mohero chiege oherore owuon.
Koro wanyalo wacho angʼo? Bende wanyalo wacho ni joma ok jo-Yahudi mane ok otemo matek mondo oyud ngima ema koro oseyudo ngima makare nogo miyudo kuom yie;
Nyaka gimak adiera matut mar yie gi chuny maler maonge richo moro amora.

Jogo man-gi ruodhi moyie kuom Kristo kik nyisgi achaya moro amora nikech gin jowete kuom Kristo. Kar timo kamano to owinjore gitinegi maber moloyo, nikech jogo mayudo ohala e tichgi gin owete kuom Kristo ma gihero. Magi e gik manyaka ipuonj ji kijiwogi matek.
To kapo ni moko kuomgi ne onge gi yie, to bende bedogi maonge yie nyalo ketho adiera mar Nyasaye?
Kar timo kamano, to achiel kuom askechego nochwowo ngʼet Yesu gi tongʼ, mi remo gi pi nochwer.
Chik ma amiyou ema: Herreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato, mana kaka an bende aseherou.
Kik uchiw fuonde ringreu mondo obed gima itimogo richo, to chiwreuru ni Nyasaye kaka joma osegol e tho moter e ngima; kendo chiwneuru fuonde mag ringreu mondo obed gik mitimogo timbe makare.
To wan ok wan jogo madok chien kendo lal, to wan jogo moyie kendo ma ireso.
Kamano Israel duto ibiro war, mana kaka ondiki niya, “Jawar nobi koa Sayun; enoriemb richo oa kuom Jakobo.
Jo-Yahudigo ema nonego Ruoth Yesu kod jonabi mag-gi, kendo gin ema ne giriembowa oko. Ok gilongʼo ne Nyasaye kendo gimon gi ji duto,
Ka wasiko watimo atima richo mana mar oyiem bangʼ ngʼeyo adiera, to onge misango moro ma pod odongʼ,
Kendo Nyasaye nochierowa gi Kristo, momiyo wabet kode e duongʼ mar polo ei Kristo Yesu,
Emomiyo, ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu nyaka we miriambo duto kendo wach adiera ne nyawadgi, nikech wan duto wan fuond ringruok achiel.
To ne ok waweyonegi thuolo kata matin, mondo eka adiera mar Injili kik lalnu.
Kuom mano, ngʼat ma wuoyo gi dhok moro amora ma ji kia, olem mondo obed gi nyalo mar loko tiend gik mowacho.
Kindeno Saulo ne pod siemo jopuonjre mag Ruoth, kochano mar negogi. Nodhi ir jadolo maduongʼ
“Koro abiro iri, to awacho gigi kapod an e piny, mondo gibed gi morna mogundho eigi.
To beduru mamor nikech uriworu kod Kristo e sandne, mondo unudok moil chuth chiengʼ ma duongʼne nofwenyre.
Ne angʼiyo iye mi aneno kit le mopidhi man-gi tiende angʼwen manie piny, gi le mager mag bungu, kod le mamol, gi winy mafuyo e kor polo.
To koro nyaka ulony oko kit richo duto kaka: ich wangʼ gi mirima gi himruok gi ketho nying ji kod weche mochido.
mi odak kodgi kendo tiyo kodgi nikech en bende ne en jatwangʼ hema mana kaka gin.
Emomiyo koro kik uyie mondo richo obed gi loch e ringreu matho ka uchopo gombone maricho.
E nying Ruoth Yesu Kristo, wachiko kendo wasiemo joma kamago mondo gibed mos kendo giti matek mondo giyud yo ma gikonyorego.
“Nikech kwerewago ne nyiego omako gi Josef, ne giuse kaka misumba ne jo-Misri. To nikech Nyasaye ne ni kode,
Achiel kuomgi, mane iluongo ni Agaba nochungʼ mokoro wach kuom Roho, ni kech marach ne biro landore mi kwak piny Rumi duto. Kejni nobet e kinde loch Klaudio.
Kane Paulo osetieko wacho wechegi, nogoyo chonge piny kaachiel kodgi duto mi nolemo.
Jo-Kristo Yesu madier duto oseguro e msalaba kit dhano machon gi gombone duto kod dwarone.
Jowetena ka uyudo tembe mayoreyore to kwanreuru ka johawi kendo beduru gi mor mar adier
Omiyo ka wawacho ni wan e winjruok kode to pod wawuotho e mudho to wariambo kendo ok wawuothi e adiera.
Noneno polo koyawore, kendo ka gimoro machalo gi suka malach moyar iloro piny ka omake gi kondene angʼwen.
Kama wantiereni nitie jo-Parthia, Media, Elam, Mesopotamia, Judea, Kapadokia, Ponto, Asia,
Bende walamo kamano mondo udag e ngima ma Ruoth morgo, ka umiye mor e yore duto, kendo unyago olemo mag timbe mabeyo bende ka umedo bedo gi ngʼeyo Nyasaye.
Timotheo wuoda, amiyi Chikni kaluwore gi weche mane okor kuomi chon. Ti kod chikni mondo iked lweny maber,
Bangʼ mano, nawinjo gima chalo gi koko maduongʼ mar oganda ei polo kawacho niya, “Haleluya! Warruok gi duongʼ kod teko odog ne Nyasachwa,
Un to ne utho e timbeu ma ok kare kod richou,
Ok unyal madho kikombe Ruoth kaachiel gi kikombe jochiende bende; kendo ok unyal chiemo e mesa Ruoth, ka uchiemo e mesa jochiende bende.
To e dieru kik winjre ni nitie terruok kata kit dwanyruok moro amora, kata wuoro, nikech gik ma kamago ok owinjore jomaler moluwo Nyasaye otim.
Gik moko duto ler mana ni jomaler, to kuom joma okethore ma ok oyie to onge gima ler. Chutho, pachgi kaachiel gi chunygi monego onyisgi kethogi osetho.
Ji duto mane owinje nowuoro ka gipenjore niya, “Donge ma e ngʼat mane sando joma ne luongo Nying Yesu Jerusalem? Donge osebiro ka mana mondo okawgi kaka joma otwe mondo otergi ni Jodolo madongo?”
To tich ma Yesu oseyudo duongʼ moloyo margino, mana kaka winjruok mokelo, ma en e jathek ber moloyo winjruok machon, nikech en winjruok ma singruok mabeyo moloyo ema guro.
Nikech an aneno ni ka angima, to angima nikech Kristo, to ka atho to en ohala.
omiyo koro an gichir malongʼo ni Jal mane ochako tich maberno e chunyu biro dhi kode nyime nyaka chop orum e odiechieng Kristo Yesu.

Wangʼeyo bende ni Wuod Nyasaye osebiro kendo osemiyowa rieko mar winjo tiend wach, mondo wangʼe ngʼat ma ja-adiera, ngʼat makoro wanie iye, en wuode Yesu Kristo. En e Nyasaye madier kendo en e ngima mochwere.
Ka nyalore, to temuru mondo udag gi kwe gi ji duto.
Wamakuru motegno geno ma wan-go ma ok wamindni, nikech Nyasaye mosemiyowa singruok en ja-adier.
Aweyonu kwe; kwe mara ema amiyou. En kwe ma pinyni ok nyal miyou. Kik chunyu parre kendo kik ubed maluor.
Kuom mano, wan gi chir pile, kendo wangʼeyo ni ka pod wadak e ringruogni, to wan mabor gi Ruoth.
“To ngʼat mawinjo wechena to ok riti, to an ok angʼadne bura, nikech ne ok abiro mondo angʼadne piny bura, to nabiro mondo ares piny.
Kik wachal gi Kain mane en koth ngʼama rach, omiyo nonego owadgi mahie. To nonego owadgi nangʼo? Nonego owadgi nikech timbene ne richo, to timbe owadgi ne ni kare.
Chula ka chula nolal nono kendo gode duto bende nolal kamano.
Kata obedo ni Ibrahim ne chalo ngʼama osetho kamano, to kothe nodoko mangʼeny mana ka sulwe manie polo kendo mana ka kwoyo manie dho nam.
Opak Ruodhwa mochwere! En Ruoth ma ok tho, kendo ma ok ne. En e Nyasaye kende. Duongʼ kod pak odogne nyaka chiengʼ. Amin.
Nokok gi dwol maduongʼ kowacho niya, “Luoruru Nyasaye kendo miyeuru duongʼ, nikech sa ma ongʼadoe bura osechopo! Lamuru Jal mane ochweyo polo gi piny kaachiel gi nam kod sokni mag pi.”

E kindeno kar kwan mar jopuonjre ne medore, omiyo jo-Yahudi mane wacho dho jo-Yunani nochako ngʼur gi jo-Yahudi wetegi mane wacho dho Hibrania. Jo-Yahudi mane wacho dho jo-Yunani ne ywak ni mon ma chwogi othogi ne ojwangʼ kaluwore gi kony mar chiemo mane ipogo mon ma chwogi otho.
Mano e kit ngima mane oluongue nikech Kristo nosandi nikech un, mine oweyonu ranyisi mondo un bende uluw timne.
Nikech kata e kinde mane wan kodu ne wamiyou chik niya, “Ka ngʼato budho abudha ma ok odwar tiyo to kik ochiem.”
“Nikech Nyasaye nohero piny ahinya, omiyo nochiwo Wuode ma miderma, mondo ngʼato angʼata moyie kuome kik lal, to obed gi ngima mochwere.
To chiengʼ moro achiel jachien nodwokogi niya, “Yesu to angʼeyo, kendo Paulo bende angʼeyo, to un, to un ngʼa gini?”
Eka naneno ondiek malichno gi ruodhi mag piny kod ogendinigi mag lweny kochokore kaachiel mondo giked gi Jal moidho faras kod ogandane mar lweny.
Ne wadonjo ei yie moro moa Adramutio mane onego ogow e mier mamoko manie dho nam molworo piny Asia. Bangʼe ne wasiayo yie mi wawuok. Aristarko ja-Makedonia moa Thesalonika bende ne nikodwa.
Paruru joma ni e od twech mana ka gima un bende otweu kodgi. Joma isando bende paruru mana ka gima un bende isandou kodgi.
Gimoro amora mutimo kata ma uwacho, to timuru e nying Ruoth Yesu, kugoyo erokamano ni Nyasaye Wuoro e nying Yesu.
Ngʼat mipuonjo Kristo nyaka pogne japuonjne gik moko duto mabeyo.

To ne ok omiye girkeni moro e pinyni, kata lowo matin moromo tielo nyono. Nyasaye nosingorene ni en kaachiel gi nyikwaye mane biro aa bangʼe ne biro kawo lopni, kata obedo ni Ibrahim ne onge gi nyathi e kindeno.
Ruodhno nowuondo jowa mosando kwereu malit, ka ochunogi mondo giwit nyithindgi oko mondo otho.
Kuom mano, Petro gi japuonjre machielono nowuok modhi kama noyike.
Omiyo atemo matek ndalo duto mondo kinda gi Nyasaye kod ji duto obed maber maonge bura.
Jogi onge gi wichkuot mana ka apaka mager mar nam, madhwolo buoyo kendo gibagni mana ka sulwe mabayo, gin joma osekan-negi kum mar mudho mandiwa manyaka chiengʼ.
Ne ok ayude kuom dhano moro amora, to bende ne ok opuonjago. Yesu Kristo owuon ema nofwenyona wachno.
Nimar kane pod ringruok chikowa, chik ne chiewo gombowa maricho, kendo negitiyoe ringrewa, omiyo ne wanyago olemo makelo tho.
Mano emomiyo ne oyiera kaka jahul wach kendo kaka jaote. Awacho adier, ok ariambi, kendo an japuonj wach yie madier ne joma ok jo-Yahudi.
Joma orito chike Nyasaye ni kuome to en bende en kuomgi. To ma e kaka wangʼeyo ni Nyasaye odak eiwa: Wangʼeyo nikech Roho ma osemiyowa.
Kik ngʼato dwar mana gik makonye en owuon, to ngʼato mondo odwar gima konyo jowadgi bende.
Daguru gi winjruok e kindu. Kik usungru, to beduru gi chuny mohero riwore gi joma ni e ngima mapiny. Kik ngʼato wuondre ni oriek moloyo ji mamoko.
Weuru kecho gi mirima gi ich wangʼ gi gwandruok gi himruok gi ketho nying kod himruok duto.
Asedoko jatich mar kanyakla mar joma oyie kaluwore gi ote mane Nyasaye oorago iru mondo ayalnu wechene duto,
Yie wiye ne rachar ka yie rombo, bende ne rachar ka pe, to wengene ne chalo gi mach makakni.
Magi duto timore mondo okonyu, mondo kaka ngʼwono medo chopo ni ji mangʼeny moloyo, e kaka ji mangʼeny dwoko erokamano ni Nyasaye, mondo Nyasaye oyud duongʼ.
Ngʼato angʼata mochamo ringra kendo omadho remba siko kuoma, to an bende asiko kuome.
Eka nodwoke niya, “Ee, Ruoth, ayie ni in e Kristo ma Wuod Nyasaye, ma nonego obi e piny.”
Joma oyie kuom Kristo noketo chunygi kuom puonj joote, kendo kuom lalruok, gi ngʼingo makati kod lamo.
Isehero tim makare to imon gi timbe maricho; emomiyo Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osetingʼi malo moyombo jowadu, nikech osewiri gi mo mamiyi mor.”
Ne ogolo chik mi oneg Jakobo owad gi Johana gi ligangla.
Pogri kod mbekni manono mag piny nikech jok moketo chunygi e gik ma kamago medo bedo mabor moloyo gi Nyasaye.
Ngʼama mon gi owadgi en janek, to ungʼeyo ni janek onge gi ngima mochwere.
Kane gisetieko chiemo, Yesu nopenjo Simon Petro niya, “Simon wuod Johana, bende ihera adier moloyo jogi?” Nodwoke niya, “Ee, Ruoth, ingʼeyo ni aheri.” Yesu nowachone niya, “Kare pidh nyiromba.”
Ngʼat moro Roho omiyo nyalo mar wuoyo gi rieko, ngʼat machielo Rohono omiyo tiend ngʼeyo weche matut.
To e ote mar ariyo, Josef nohulore ni owetene, mi Farao koro nongʼeyo jo-dalagi Josef.
Mana kaka Muma wacho niya, “Ngʼato angʼata mohero ngima kendo ni gigeno kuom ndalo mabiro mabeyo, nyaka ogengʼ lewe kik wuo marach kendo ogengʼ dhoge kuom wacho miriambo.

Joma oyie kuom Kristo duto ne timo gik moko gi chuny achiel kod paro achiel. Onge ngʼato kuomgi kata achiel mane okawo mwandune kaka gige owuon, to ngʼato ka ngʼato ne pogo gige duto ni nyawadgi, ka gikonyore ngʼato gi ngʼato.
Puonj maduongʼ mogik mane ayudo kuom Ruoth mi amiyou ema: Kristo notho nikech richowa kaluwore gi Ndiko,
Ne oyud kuome remb jonabi gi remb jomaler, kod remb ji duto mane osenegi e piny.”
Kane joma ok jo-Yahudi owinjo wachno, negimor kendo negirwako wach Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo joma nochan-negi yudo ngima mochwere noyie kuom Yesu.
Jal manyiso wechegi duto wacho niya, “Ee, abiro mapiyo.” Amin! Bi, Ruoth Yesu.
Kik uwe ma ok uparo gigo madiera kod mowinjore gi pak. Gimoro amora mane apuonjou, kendo uyudo kuoma, mane uwinjo kawacho, kata atimo, to tigouru; ka utimo kamano to Nyasach kwe nobed kodu.
Kik ukawe kaka jasigu, to siemeuru asiema kaka owadu kuom Ruoth.
Kik uyie mondo ngʼato angʼata omak pachu gi riekni manono mag piny gi wuond manono ma wito ji, ma gin rieko ma aa kuom puonj dhano gi timbe mag piny, to ok kuom Kristo.
aringo matek mondo achopi mondo omi ayud pokna mane Nyasaye oluongane kuom Kristo Yesu.
mane ochiworenwa mondo oreswa wawe timbe maricho kendo mondo opwodh ne en owuon joma owinjore bedo joge, moikore timo gik mabeyo.
“Awachonu adier ni ngʼato angʼata mawinjo wachna, kendo moyie kuom Jal mane oora, nigi ngima mochwere, kendo ok bi ngʼadne buch tho; to osengʼado oa e tho modonjo e ngima.
Malaikano mane owuoyo koda, ne nigi luth mar rapim molos gi dhahabu mipimogo dalano, gi dhorangeyene kod ohingane.
To giko joma kamago en kethruok nikech igi e nyasachgi, kendo gik ma gimiyorego duongʼ ema kelonigi wichkuot, ka pachgi otwere gige pinyni.
Kik obed ngʼat moyudo warruok machiegni, nono to sunga nyalo make mi opodhi kendo bura loye kaka noloyo jachien.

Osiepena mageno, kata obedo ni ne aikora ahinya mondo andiknu kuom wach warruok ma wan duto wan-go, naneno ni ber koro andiknu mondo ajiwu uked matek kuom wach yie mane ochiwne jomaler dichiel kendo mogik.
Igi nowangʼ kendo chunygi nokethore nikech jootego ne puonjo ji ni joma osetho biro chier kuom Yesu.
nikech richone osebiwore mochopo e polo malo, kendo Nyasaye koro oseparo timbene mamonogo.
Nochako olimo dala mar Kana, manie piny Galili, kama ne oloke pi divai. To ne nitie jatelo moro ma wuode ne tuo Kapernaum.
Kik chunyu nyosre, to meduru bedo motegno, kutiyo ni Ruoth.
Kata obedo ni pok unene to pod uhere ahera kendo kata obedo ni ok unene kata sani to pod uyie ayiea kuome kendo upongʼ gi mor maduongʼ.
Wangʼeyo ni wadak ei Nyasaye kendo en bende en eiwa, nikech osemiyowa Rohone.
To ne nitie njagi motingʼo kongʼo makech kanyo, omiyo ne giluto siponj e iye bangʼe ne gichwoyo siponjno ewi kede moro mi gitere nyaka e dho Yesu.
Nikech oseresowa waa e loch mar mudho mi okelowa e pinyruoth mar Wuode mohero,
Owetena, asiemou mondo ungʼi maber joma kelo pogruok, kendo keto chwanyruok e yoreu ma ok oluwore gi puonj museyudo. Wereuru kodgi.
Ka en tiyo ni ji, to mondo oti, ka en puonj, to mondo opuonji.
Chiengʼno ok unukwaya gimoro amora. Awachonu adier ni Wuora biro miyou gimoro amora mukwayo e nyinga.
Mise mar ohinga mar dala nokedi gi kite mabeyo duto ma nengogi tek. Mise mokwongo nolos gi jaspa, to mar ariyo ne safir, eka mar adek ne kalkedo kendo mar angʼwen ne emerald,
Kuom mano, ngʼato ka ngʼata mongʼeyo gima ber monego otim, to ok otimo, doko jaricho.
Eka dwol noa e kom duongʼ mar loch, kawacho niya, “Pakuru Nyasachwa, un jotichne duto, un joge moluore, jomatindo kod jomadongo!”
Kapod wan e kiruni to wachur ka wagombo mondo orwakwa gi odwa mar polo
Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka non wuodhe owuon eka doyud gima dopakrego kuom tich maber mosetimo kik ipiem gi ngʼat machielo,

Ka ngʼato paro ni ok otim maber ne osiepne ma nyako mangili modwaro nyuomo, kendo ka nyakono hike koro medore, to dichwono oneno ni onego okende, to ber mondo okend nyakono. Oonge gi ketho kotimo kamano kendo onego gikendre.
Giniriembu e sinagogi; chutho ndalo biro ma ngʼama nonegu notim kamano kaparo ni otiyo ni Nyasaye.
Eka ne aneno ranyisi machielo malich ahinya ei polo: Ne aneno Malaike abiriyo, motingʼo masiche abiriyo, mago ne masiche mogik nikech ka girumo to mirimb Nyasaye chopo kare.
To Yesu nodwoke niya, “Kapo ni awachone gimoro amora marach to hul ane gino. To kapo nawacho adier to ithala nangʼo?”
Ee, in bende akwayi, jatich wadwa, mondo ikony mon-go e wachni. Gisetiyo koda ka gikedo matek ne Injili, kaachiel gi Klement kod jotich wetena mamoko ma nying-gi ondiki e kitap ngima.
nimar jogi ne osechwero remb jogi maler, gi jonabi mane onegi, to koro isemiyo gimadho remo mana kaka owinjore kodgi.”
Gima kamano kik timre! Kaka wan joma ne osetho kuom richo; ere kaka wanyalo dhi nyime kwadak e richo?
Ondiek malichno ma yande nitie, to tinde onge, en ruoth mar aboro. Bende en achiel kuom ruodhi abiriyogo, kendo odhiyo e kar kethruokne.
Muma to wacho angʼo kuom wachni? Owacho niya, “Riemb dhako ma misumbani kod wuode nimar wuod dhako ma misumbani ok nobed jacham girkeni kaachiel gi wuod dhako ma ni thuoloni.”
Joma gombo mondo obed gi mwandu nwangʼo tem kendo gimoko e obadho kuom gik mofuwo mangʼeny kod gombo mathoth kendo gombo ma kamano kelo kethruok kendo miyo ji lal.
To ondiek malichno gi tunge apargo mane ineno biro bedo mager kod dhakono ma jachode. Ginihinye kagitieke kendo weye duk; ginicham ringre, kendo giniwangʼe duto gi mach.
To ngʼat mohero Nyasaye, to Nyasaye ongʼeyo.
Koro wanyalo wacho nangʼo mogik? Bende waber adier? Ok kamano ngangʼ! Wasengʼado bura ni jo-Yahudi kod joma ok jo-Yahudi gi joricho mana machalre.
E kindeno ema ne gilosoe kido milamo machalo gi nyaroya. Negitimone misango, mi gilosone sawo ka gimiyo gima lwetgi ema ne oloso duongʼ!

To joma odongʼ mane masichego ok onego pod ne ok oweyo richo mar lamo gik mane giloso kendo gichweyo gi lwetgi; kendo ok giweyo lamo jochiende gi nyiseche manono molos gi dhahabu gi fedha kod mula gi kidi kod bao, ma gin gik ma ok nen bende ma ok winj wach, kendo ok wuothi.
Kaka wangʼeyo gima luoro Ruoth en, wajiwo ji mondo gidwog ire. Wan to Nyasaye ongʼeyowa malongʼo, kendo ageno ni un bende ungʼeyowa malongʼo chuth e chunyu maiye.
Adier, chon waduto ne wachal kodgi, ka watimo gik mangima mar dhano dwaro, kendo waluwo gombo kod paro mag ringruok. Wan bende, e kitwa, mana kaka ji mamoko, ne wan e bwo mirima.
Petro nomedo siemogi gi weche mamoko mathoth; komedo jiwogi kowacho niya, “Tonyuru ua kuom tiengʼ mokethoreni.”
Nimar ka idak kaka kido mar richo dwaro, to ibiro tho; to ka kuom Roho, inego timbe maricho mag ringruok, to ibiro bedo mangima.
Mana kaka Muma wacho niya, “Ngʼato angʼata moyie kuome ok none wichkuot.”
Mokwongo, adwokone Nyasacha erokamano, kuom Yesu Kristo nikech un duto, nimar yie maru landore e pinje duto.
Nimar wangʼeyo, owetewa ma Nyasaye ohero, ni oseyierou,
To moloyo mago duto, herreuru gihera matut ngʼato gi ngʼato, nikech hera umo richo mangʼeny.
Kane osengʼad wach ni onego okwangʼwa wadhi Italia, Paulo kod joma otwe mamoko noketi e lwet jatend jolweny moro ma nyinge Julias. Ngʼatno ema ne jatend oganda lweny mane iluongo ni Jorit Dala Ruoth.
ka giwero wend Musa jatich Nyasaye gi wend Nyarombo kama: “Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye Maratego, mano kaka tijeni dongo kendo lich. Yaye Ruodh Nyasaye ogendini, yoreni nikare kendo gin adiera.
Mana kaka nyithindo mayom, beduru gi siso gi chak mayom mar chuny mondo kumadhe to omi udongi e yor warruok,

Eka nawinjo dwol moa e polo kawacho niya, “Ndik ni: Chakre kawuononi, jogo gin joma ogwedhi matho kogeno kuom Ruoth!” Roho bende wacho ni, “Ee, gin johawi adier, nikech giniywe kuom tichgi matek, nimar timbegi noluwgi.”
Kit lemo ma Nyasaye Wuonwa oyiego ni ler kendo onge ketho en mondo wakony nyithi kiye gi mon ma chwogi otho e chandruokgi, kendo mondo ngʼato ka ngʼato oritre kik timbe maricho mag piny ywaye.
Anyisou wechegi mondo kik ngʼato owuondu gi weche manono maywayo ji.

Eka nawinjo ka gik mangima duto manie polo kendo e piny kod e bwo piny, kendo e nam, kendo gigo duto mochwe modak eigi, kawer niya: “Pak gi duongʼ kod loch obed ni Jal mobet e kom duongʼ gi Nyarombo manyaka chiengʼ!”
Malaika mar ariyo nogoyo turumbetene, mi gima chalo gi got maduongʼ, maliel gi mach, nowiti e nam. To bath nam moromo achiel kuom adek nolokore remo,
Ne giywaye mi gigole oko mar dala maduongʼ kendo gichako chiele gi kite. Joneno mag miriambo nohangone wach moketo lepgi e tiend wuowi moro ma nyinge Saulo.
Kendo niya, “Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye un joma ok jo-Yahudi duto, ee ji duto mondo odende,”
Nimar gik moko duto oa kuome, kendo gintie nikech en, kendo gin mage duto. Duongʼ obed mare nyaka chiengʼ! Amin.
Kinyne Johana noneno Yesu kabiro ire, mi nowacho niya, “Neuru, Jalcha e Nyarombo mar Nyasaye, magolo richo mar piny!
Yie ema nomiyo Rahab dhako ma jachode ne ok nonegi kane inego joma ok winj wach Nyasaye, nikech norwako jombetre mag Israel gi ngʼwono.
Jakuo biro mana mondo okwal kendo oneki kendo oketh gik moko, An to asebiro mondo giyud ngima, kendo giyude mogundho.
Wan to polo e thurwa, kendo warito Jawarwa Ruoth Yesu Kristo gi geno mondo obi oomwa.
Kuom mano, rwakuru joweteu mana kaka Kristo bende norwakou eka Nyasaye oyud pak.

Kaw jogi mondo idhi ipwodhri kaachiel kodgi, bangʼe ichulnegi nengo mar misengini monego gichul bangʼ pwodhruok, eka oliel yie wigi. Kitimo kamano, to ji duto biro kawo weche duto ma ji wacho kuomi kaka miriambo, kendo gibiro kawi kaka ngʼat moluwo Chik Musa.
To bende en kwar joma oter nyangu, ma ok oter mana nyangu kende, to maluwo kit yie ma kwarwa Ibrahim ne nigo kane pok otere nyangu.
Eka negigoyo ombulu, kendo ombulu nolwar kuom Mathias. Omiyo nomede kuom joote apar gachiel mamoko.
“Ogwedh jogo ma kethogi owenegi, kendo ma richogi oseruchi.
Joneno ariyogo e yiende ariyo mag zeituni, kod rachungi teyni ariyo mochungʼ e nyim kom Ruodh piny.
Owinjore ubed gikuyo kendo uywagi, ka ugoyo nduru. Nyiero munyierogo onego olokre ywak, kendo mor mumorgo onego olokre kuyo.
Osiepna, kik iluw timbe maricho, to luw tim maber. Ngʼat matimo gima ber en ngʼat Nyasaye, to ngʼat matimo gima rach pok oneno Nyasaye.

Ne oyudo kido mar nyangu achien kaka ranyisi mar bedo ngʼama kare, ma noseyudo motelo kuom yie kapok otere nyangu. Kuom mano, en kwar ji duto moyie to ok oter nyangu, mondo joma kamago bende obed joma kare.
nikech ngʼato angʼata mosetho osegony kuom richo.
Kinde duto wawuotho ka watingʼo tho mar Yesu e ringrewa, mondo eka ngima mar Yesu onere e ringrewa.
Nikech ji duto dwaro mana gik makonyogi giwegi, to ok mag Yesu Kristo.
Yie ema nomiyo Ibrahim obedo wuoro, kata obedo ni noseti ahinya, kendo Sara chiege ne migumba, to nomiye teko mar bedo wuoro nikech nogeno ni ngʼat mane omiye singruok ne en ja-adiera.
Dwach Jal mane oora en ni kik awit kata achiel kuom ji duto mosemiya, to ni mondo achiergi chiengʼ giko.

wan to wangʼeyo ni nitie Nyasaye achiel kende, ma en Wuoro. En ema gik moko duto noa kuome, kendo nomiyowa ngima. Bende nitie Ruoth achiel kende ma en Yesu Kristo. En ema nomiyo gik moko duto obetie kendo en ema omiyowa ngima.
Koro Timotheo osedwogo koa iru, kendo osekelonwa weche mabeyo kuom yieu kod herau. Osenyisowa kaka usiko uparowa gi paro mabeyo kendo ni un bende ugombo nenowa mana kaka wan bende wagombo nenou.
To ka Jakwath Maduongʼ obiro to unuyud osimbo mar duongʼ ma ok kethre ma nosik karieny nyaka chiengʼ.
Emomiyo ka koro wan gi geno machal kama, wawuoyo gi chir mathoth.
To jogi wuoyo marach ka giyanyo nyaka gik ma ok giwinj tiendgi. Gichalo le maonge rieko, mager, maonge paro, mane ochwe mana mondo omaki oyangʼ. Jogi biro lal nono mana ka le mag bungu.
Ne ok owacho kamano nikech nohero jodhier, to nikech ne en jakuo. Kaka jakeno mar pesa, nothoro konyore gi pesa ma nokanogo.
Omiyo koro wangʼeyo kendo wageno kuom hera ma Nyasaye oherowago. Nyasaye en hera. Ngʼato mosiko e hera osiko kuom Nyasaye, kendo Nyasaye bende odak kuome.
Joma sand nokeyo nikech wach nek Stefano nodhi Foinike, Saipras nyaka Antiokia, ka gilando Injili ne jo-Yahudi kende.
To geno Nyasaye gi chuny modhil en ohala maduongʼ.
Bende nomiye teko mondo oked gi jomaler mag Nyasaye kendo ologi, kendo nomiye loch kuom dhoudi duto, gi ogendini kod dhok duto miwacho gi pinje duto.
To ere kaka ngʼato diyud pak ka uyudo chwat michwadougo nikech ujoketho? To ka isandou nikech tim maber ma utimo, kendo ka unano e bwo sand ma kamano, to Nyasaye pwoyou.
Kuom mano, Kristo e jathek mar singruok manyien, mamiyo joma oluongi yudo girkeni mosiko mosesingnegi, nikech koro osetho kargi kaka misango mamiyo gibedo thuolo kuom kethogi e bwo singruok mokwongo.
En angʼo makoro wanyalo wacho? Dwadhi nyime ka watimo richo mondo eka ngʼwono omedre?
Bende, tim moro amora makwodo wich, kata wach mochido, kata angera mag oyuma ok owinjore kodu, makmana dwoko ne Nyasaye erokamano.

Nangʼicho to ne aneno faras marabuor e nyima! Ngʼat moidhe niluongo ni Tho, to piny joma otho ne luwo bangʼe machiegni. Ne omigi teko kuom bath piny moromo achiel kuom angʼwen mondo gimi lweny kata kech kata dera kata tuoche kata ondiegi maricho mag bungu mondo gineg ji.

Kuom mano, singruok biro kuom yie eka obedo kuom ngʼwono, kendo nyikwa Ibrahim duto oyud singruokno, to ok ni joma rito chik kende to nyaka joma nigi yie machal gi mar Ibrahim, nikech en e wuonwa duto.
To Bangʼ yala, negidwaro weya, nikech negiyudo ni aonge gi ketho mowinjore gi tho.
Omiyo ok otenore kuom dwaro kata tich mar ngʼato, to en kuom kech mar Nyasaye.
Kik waterre kaka moko kuomgi notimo, mi ji alufu piero ariyo gadek kuomgi notho odiechiengʼ achiel.
to aneno chik machielo katiyo e fuonde mag ringra makedo gi chik manie chunya, mamiyo abedo misumba Chik mar richo manie fuondena.

Kuom mano koro waweuru puonj michakogo ngʼeyo wach Kristo, to wadhiuru nyime mondo wadok joma otegno. Ok owinjore mondo wachak puonjou manyien weche michakogo bedo ja-Kristo, kaka lokruok weyo timbe matero ji e tho to gi yie kuom Nyasaye;
Kuom mano, kik ngʼato angʼata otamre ma ok orwake, to konyeuru mondo odhi nyime e wuodhe gi kwe, mondo oyud yo mar duogo ira nikech arite en kaachiel gi jowete mamoko.
Jowetena, ere konyruok ma ngʼato yudo ka owacho ni en gi yie to oonge gi tim? Bende yie machal kamano nyalo rese?
Gikanyono jo-Jerusalem moko nochako penjo niya, “Donge ma e ngʼat mane gidwaro nego cha?
Bangʼ wachonegi wechego, nokudho muche kuomgi, kowachonegi niya, “Nwangʼuru Roho Maler.
Nikech ne gikia ngima makare ma aa kuom Nyasaye, gisetemo keto margi giwegi, ka gidagi rwako yor Nyasaye moketogo ji kare.
Ngʼat moyie kuom Wuod Nyasaye nigi nenoni e chunye, to ngʼama ok oyie kuome miyo Nyasaye doko ja-miriambo, nikech odagi yie gima Nyasaye osewacho kaka janeno kuom Wuode.
Awachonu adier, ni ngʼato ka ngʼato ma oyie kuoma biro timo gik ma asebedo ka atimo. Bende obiro timo gik madongo moloyo magi, nikech adhi ka Wuora.
Puonj wasumbini mondo owinj ruodhi mag-gi e weche duto, kendo gitem timonegi mana gik malongʼo ma ok gidwokore kodgi,
Ritreuru mondo une ni onge ngʼato kuomu molal kendo oweyo ngʼwono mar Nyasaye, kendo kik uwe sigu moro bedi e kindu manyalo ketho ji mangʼeny.
Bende nyaka obed ngʼat ma joma ok oyie wuoyo kuome maber, mondo kik obadho mar jachien gaje mi opodhi kendo one wichkuot.
Kristo, kaluwore gi dwarone, osemiyo ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomwa ngʼwono.
Eka Malaika mar ariyo noolo tape e nam mi pi nam nolokore remo machalo gi remb ngʼat motho, kendo gik mangima duto modak e nembego ne otho.
Kik uwinjgi mana mondo umor wangʼ-gi seche ma ginenou, to mana ka wasumb Kristo, timuru dwaro Nyasaye koa e chunyu.
Rituru chunyu maler maonge bura, mondo timbeu mabeyo kuom Kristo okuod wi joma wuoyo kuomu marach.
Adier, Wuora dwaro ni mondo ji duto mogeno kuom Wuowi, kendo moyie kuome mondo obed gi ngima mochwere, kendo ochiergi chiengʼ giko piny.”
Gikanyono malaika mar Ruoth nogoyo Herode piny, nikech ne ok omiyo Nyasaye duongʼ kendo kute nochamo ringre, mi otho.
Duongʼ obed ni Nyasaye ma Wuon Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo, kendo ma Wuon ngʼwono kendo Nyasach Loch duto,
Jomoko osebaro oweyo magi mi gidonjo e mbekni mag oyuma maonge tiendgi.
Aonge wichkuot kuom Injilini, nikech en e teko mar Nyasaye makelo ni ngʼato angʼata moyie warruok, mokwongo ni jo-Yahudi, eka bangʼe ni joma ok jo-Yahudi bende.
Nikech onge ngʼama nyalo keto mise machielo mopogore gi mano moseketi, ma en Yesu Kristo.
Omiyo ngʼato ka ngʼato kuomu nyaka her chiege mana kaka oherore owuon kendo dhako nyaka luor chwore.
Kane uyudo utho e richou gi kit ngimau ma ok ter nyangu, Nyasaye ne omiyo udoko mangima kuom Kristo. Noweyonwa richowa duto,
Kik ijwangʼ michni mane omiyi kaka nokor kuomi chiengʼ mane jodongo oketo lwetgi kuomi.
Eka ne aneno polo manyien gi piny manyien. Polo mokwongo gi piny mokwongo noselal, to nam bende noselal kamano.
Beduru mamor pile;
E ndalogo ji nodwar tho, to ok giniyude; ginigomb mondo githo to tho noring-gi aringa.
Wayie ni Yesu notho mochier oa kuom joma otho, omiyo wayie ni Nyasaye biro chiero jomo oyie duto mosetho kaachiel kode.
Ka ngʼato ohulo ni Yesu en wuod Nyasaye, to Nyasaye odak e iye kendo en bende odak ei Nyasaye.
Ne opuonju mondo uwe kit ngimau machon kendo ulony dhano machon makelo kethruok nikech gombo maricho mag wuond.
An e dhorangach; ma ngʼato angʼata mokadho kuoma nokwo kendo nodonj iye mi owuog oko kendo oyud kar kwath maber.
Nogogi gi kite, nongʼadgi malit bende moko nonegi gi ligangla. Ne giwuotho ka gi kacha, ka girwako piende rombe gi piende diek, kagidhier kisandogi kendo kichandogi malit;
Ka ungʼeyo ni Kristo en ngʼama kare to onego ungʼe bende ni ngʼato ka ngʼato matimo gima kare en nyathi Nyasaye.
Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyowa chik niya, “ ‘Asemiyo udoko ler ne Ogendini, mondo uland warruok e tunge piny duto.’”

Wasekwedo timbe malingʼ-lingʼ mag miriambo makwodo wich, ok wakonyre gi wuond, bende ok wagaj wach Nyasaye, to wawuotho e ler mar adiera kendo wachiwore ni ji duto, mondo chunygi orwakwa e nyim Nyasaye.
Kaka koro en gi duongʼ, kobet e bad Nyasaye korachwich, Wuoro osemiye Roho Maler mane osingore ni nochiw, kendo oseoro gima koro uneno kendo uwinjoni.”
mi urwako dhano manyien mamedo bedo manyien pile mondo obed machal gi kit jachwechne.
Kane Yesu owinjo mano, nowacho niya, “Tuono ok en mar tho, to mano otimore mana ni mondo Nyasaye oyud duongʼ, kendo mondo Wuod Nyasaye oyud duongʼ kuome.”
Nikech kuom Injilino ema Nyasaye ketoe dhano kare kuom yie kende ma ok omedie gimoro machielo, mana kaka ondiki niya, “Ngʼat makare nobed mangima kuom yie.”
Yesu nowuok kanyo kotingʼo msalape owuon nyaka kar Hanga Wich (miluongo gi dho jo-Hibrania ni Golgotha).
Wan gi mich mopogore opogore kaluwore gi ngʼwono momiwa. Ka mich ngʼato en koro wach, to mondo oti kode kaluwore gi yie mare.
Gima ngima mokwongo ne chalo gi sibuor, mar ariyo ne chalo gi nyarwath, mar adek ne lela wangʼe chalo gi mar dhano, to mar angʼwen ne chalo gi ongo mafuyo.
Beduru motangʼ ahinya kaka udak, kik udag ka joma ofuwo, to daguru ka joma riek,
Nimar onge pogruok e kind jo-Yahudi gi joma ok jo-Yahudi; Ruoth Yesu en Ruoth machalre ni ji duto, kendo en gi mwandu mogundho mopogo ni ji duto maluongo nyinge,
Kristo e giko mar Chik kendo en ema okelo ngima makare ni ji duto moyie.
Kik uparru kuom gimoro amora, to kwauru Nyasaye gik moko duto muchando, kulamo, kendo kugoyone erokamano, kuketo kwayou mondo ongʼere ni Nyasaye.
Gigi duto notimore mondo obednwa ranyisi masiemowa mondo kik wagomb gik maricho kaka ne gigombo.
Kane oyawo burno, iro nowuokie machalo gi ich mach maduongʼ. Iro moa e burno noimo chiengʼ kod boche polo molokore maratengʼ.
To kuom wachni, ngʼato kik tim ni wadgi marach kata wuonde. Ruoth biro kumo joma timo timbe ma kamago mana kaka ne wasenyisou kendo siemou.
Emomiyo ka ngʼato ni kuom Kristo to en chwech manyien; gik machon osekadho, neuru, gik manyien osechopo!
Nimar Wuoro ohero Wuowi, kendo onyise gik moko duto motimo. Ee, obiro medo nyise nyaka gik madongo moloyo magi mi unuwuor.
Ngʼato ma yande kwalo nyaka koro we kuo chuth, to nyaka oti tich gi lwete owuon mondo okonyrego kendo okony bende joma moko mochando.
Kwayo machielo ma an-go en ni mondo ilosna kar nindo, nikech an-gi geno ni ibiro gonya mana kaka usebedo kulamo.
Kik ulu kit puonj moro amora mayoreyore manyalo golou e yor adiera, nikech ngʼwono Nyasaye ema onego ojiw chunywa to ok puonj motenore kuom weche mag chiemo ma ok kel kony moro amora ni joma chamogi.
Koro wakwayou, jowetewa, mondo uchiw luor ni jogo matiyo tich Ruoth matek e dieru ma gin jotendu kendo jopuonju kuom Ruoth.
Jonywolne nowacho kamano nikech negiluoro jo-Yahudi, nimar noyudo jo-Yahudi osengʼado wach ni ngʼato angʼata ma nohul ni Yesu en Kristo ne ibiro riembi e sinagogi.
Nikech wan wawegi ema waseyudo nyangu madiera, nikech walemo ka wan ei Roho mar Nyasaye, sungawa ni kuom Kristo Yesu, kendo ok waketo genowa kuom ringruok,
To ma e chik Nyasaye: ni mondo wayie e nying Wuode Yesu Kristo kendo mondo waherre ngʼato gi ngʼato, mana kaka Kristo nochikowa.
Eka naneno ondiek malich machielo kawuok ei piny. Ne en gi tunge ariyo machalo gi mar nyarombo, to nowuoyo kaka thuol mangʼongo wuoyo.
Jowetena, kik ubed nyithindo e pachu, to chaluru nyithindo mayom mana kuom gima rach kende, to e pachu beduru jomadongo.
Ka ngʼato kuomu nigi chandruok, to onego olem. Ka ngʼato kuomu nigi mor, to onego ower wende pak.
Kuom mano jingʼuru bedeu mobengore gi chongeu monyosore.
Kaka uluongo nying Wuoro mangʼado bura ne tich ngʼato ka ngʼato machalre ka ok odew wangʼ ngʼato, daguru kaka welo e piny-ka, kod luor mowinjore.
Dwarore ni umed timo kinda kuom timo dwaro Nyasaye, eka unwangʼ gik mosesingore ni nomiu.
Yie en bedo gi adiera kuom gima wageno yudo kendo en bedo gi ratiro kuom gik ma ok wane.
Kuom mano, awachonu ka aramo kuom Ruoth, ni neuru ni ok uwuothi kaka jopiny makia Nyasaye wuotho ka pachgi modinore wuondogi.
Kuom mano, kik uwe ngʼato ongʼadnu bura kuom gik muchamo kata mumadho, kata kuom weche mag sewni mag lemo, kata sewni mitimo ka dwe manyien owuok, kata chiengʼ Sabato.
Ma emomiyo, “koro gin e nyim kom duongʼ mar Nyasaye, ka gitiyone odiechiengʼ gi otieno ei hekalune; to Jalno mobet e kom duongʼ noumgi korieyo hema mare kuomgi.
Paulo nolor piny mi nokwako wuowino. Bangʼe nowacho ni ji niya, “Kik uluor. Ongima!”
Omiyo adhil kuom duto nikech adwaro ni joma Nyasaye oyiero bende oyudie warruok miyudo kuom Kristo Yesu, kendo makelo duongʼ mochwere.
Mosreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato gi yogruok mar hera. Kwe mondo obed kodu un duto ma un kuom Kristo.
Beduru gi winjruok ngʼato gi ngʼato, mondo umi Kristo duongʼ.
Emomiyo, osiepena mageno, kaka koro usengʼeyo wachni, ritreuru mondo kik ywau gi kethruok mag jomaricho mi ulwar ua kama ber muchungʼie.
Un mon, winjuru chwou, mana kaka owinjore kuom Ruoth.
Joma osiko timo richo nyaka kwer ratiro e nyim ji eka joma moko obed maluor.
Kuom mano, waweuru ngʼado ne jowetewa bura. Kar timo kamano to temuru matek mondo kik ngʼato kuomu oket rachwany kata ragengʼ e yor nyawadgi.
to ngʼato ka ngʼato matimo maber noyud duongʼ gi pak kod kwe, mokwongo ni jo-Yahudi, eka bangʼe ni joma ok jo-Yahudi bende;
kendo neginego gero mar mach; bende negitony e lak ligangla. Nyawo margi nolokore teko mi gidoko joma ger e lweny, ka giloyo jolwenj pinje mamoko duto mane kedo kodgi.
Mogik, kik ngʼato angʼata koro kelna chandruok, nimar ringra opongʼ gi mbelni ma aseyudo kaka jaote Yesu.
Eka malaika maratego nokawo kidi machalo gi pongʼ rego maduongʼ, notingʼe kendo nobole e nam, kowacho niya, “Kamano e kaka Babulon dala maduongʼ nobol piny, mi ok nonene ngangʼ.
To un, osiepena mageno, gerreuru e yie maru maler, kendo lemuru ka un ei Roho Maler.
Kik koro ulu kit ngima pinyni, to lokreuru ka parou doko manyien pile, eka unubed gi nyalo mar pimo kendo ngʼeyo dwach Nyasaye, ma en dwache maber, mowinjore kendo malongʼo chuth.
An e jaote matinie mogik, to bende ok awinjora mondo oluonga ni jaote, nikech ne asando kanisa Nyasaye.
Kik uher piny kata gimoro amora manie pinyni. Ka ngʼato ohero piny, to hera mar Wuoro onge e iye.
Omiyo in bende ok initony, in mingʼado bura ni ngʼat machielo, nikech gima ingʼadonego ngʼat machielo burano ema bura loyigo iwuon, nikech in mingʼado bura bende itimo gik machalre gi gima otimo.

Jogo mane ji oyiego kaka sirni, ma gin; Jakobo, Petro kod Johana, noriwa lwedo kaachiel gi Barnaba kane gineno ngʼwono mane omiya. Ne giyie mondo wadhi wayal ni joma ok jo-Yahudi, ka gin to gidhi ir jo-Yahudi.

Kane jolweny oseguro Yesu, negikawo lepe mi gipogogi nyadingʼwen, bangʼe gipogore moro ka moro, kargi ji angʼwen. Lawe mar kandho kende ema ne giweyo. En ne oonge gi wangʼ usi, to notwangʼe machalre, chakre malo nyaka piny.
In mipuonjo ji mamoko, dak ipuonjri iwuon? In miyalo ni kuo rach, dibed in to ikwala?
Donge ungʼeyo ni ringreu en hekalu mar Roho Maler modak eiu kendo ma Nyasaye osechiwonu? Ok un mau uwegi;
Nikech hera mar Kristo chunowa mondo watim gik ma watimo, nikech wan gi ratiro ni ngʼato achiel notho ni ji duto; omiyo ji duto notho.
Emomiyo, owetena maler kendo ma oseluongi gi luong mar polo, keturu pachu duto kuom Yesu, ma en jaote kendo jadolo Maduongʼ mar yie mwahulo.
Asenyisou gi yore duto ni nyaka wati matek wan wawegi mondo wakonygo joma chandore, ka waparo wach mane Ruoth Yesu owachonwa ni, ‘Chiwo kelo gweth moloyo kawo!’ ”

Ji duto nyaka kwan kend kaka gima ler kendo joma okendore nyaka rit singruok mar kend. Nikech Nyasaye biro kumo ngʼato angʼata ma jachode, gi joma timo timbe dwanyruok duto bed ni gin joma nyiri kata yawuowi.
Nokulore mongʼicho, kendo noneno lewni mayom molir olir kod law ik ma nonalgo wi Yesu kani ei bur kanyo. To kata kamano, ne ok odonjo e iye.

Bangʼ mano, ne nitie mil polo makakni, koriadore kod mor polo gi yiengni malich mar piny. Piny noyiengni matek mapok oyiengni kamano nyaka aa chwech dhano. Adiera chutho ne en yiengni mar piny, marachie moloyo.

Bangʼe napodho piny e tiende mondo alame. To nowachona niya, “Ngangʼ! Kik itim kamano! An bende an mana jatich wadu matiyo kodi kaachiel gi oweteni mahulo wach kuom Yesu gichir. Nyasaye kende ema owinjore ilam! Wach adieri man kuom Yesu ema miyo jonabi Roho mar koro wach mar Yesu.”
Wan to Nyasaye oseelonwa tiend wachne mopondo kuom teko mar Roho mare. Roho Maler fwenyo gik moko duto, nyaka weche matut mag Nyasaye.
Kobiro, to rwakeuru gi mor maduongʼ kaka owadu kuom Ruoth, kendo neuru ni umiyo joma chalo kode kamano duongʼ,
Un nyithindo, luoruru jonywolu e gik moko duto, nikech mano ema longʼo ni Ruoth.

Koro ma e sunga marwa: Chunywa miyowa ratiro ni wasedak e pinyni, to moloyo e winjruok marwa kodu, ka waluoro Nyasaye kendo ka wawuotho e ler mar adier. Ok wasedak kamano nikech waluwo rieko mar pinyni, to nikech ngʼwono mar Nyasaye.
Ngʼato angʼata mongʼeyo chikena kendo orito, e ngʼama ohera. Ngʼat mohera, Wuora biro hero, kendo an bende abiro here, mi afwenyrane.”

Ginyalo nenore gioko ni rieko ni eigi ka gilemo gi lamo mar paro mar dhano, kendo kuom dembruok ma oko, kod sando ringruok, to chutho gionge ohala nikech ok ginyal konyo ngʼato gengʼo gombo mag ringruok.
Gisenyiso kanisa hera ma in-go. Konygi e wuodhgi ka ikowogi e yo mowinjore ni Nyasaye.
Pogri chuth gi mbekni mofuwo maonge rieko, kingʼeyo ni gikelo dhawo.
Koro wan duto mwaonge gi ragengʼ e wengewa wachalo gi rangʼi kendo wamiyo ler mar ruoth nenore ratiro kendo lerno medore ameda pile ka kitwa medo bedo machal kode; mano en tich Ruoth ma en Roho.

koro remb Kristo to nyalo pwodho ji e yo malich machal nade! Nochiwore ne Nyasaye kuom Roho mosiko kaka misango maonge songa, omiyo rembe biro luoko chunywa maiye mi wawe timbe motho, mondo wati ne Nyasaye mangima!
Emomiyo ka Nyasaye nomiyogi mana mich achielno ma wan bende nomiyowa kane wayie kuom Ruoth Yesu Kristo, koro an to an ngʼa ma dine agengʼ tich Nyasaye!”
Bende kik umi Roho Maler mar Nyasaye chuny lit nikech en ema Nyasaye osemiyougo kaka ranyisi ni noresu chiengʼ resruok.
Emomiyo par ane gik mane opuonji kendo mane isewinjo, makgi kendo lokri iwe richo. Ka ok ichiew to abiro biro apoya mana kaka jakuo ma ok ibi ngʼeyo sa ma anabiyee iri.
Nyithinda mageno, kik uyie ngʼato wuondu. Ngʼat matimo gima kare en ngʼama kare, mana kaka en bende en ngʼama kare.
Osiepena mageno kik uyie roho duto, to temgiuru mondo ufwenygi ka bende gia kuom Nyasaye nikech jonabi mag miriambo mathoth osebiro e piny koni gi koni.
“Emomiyo, adwaro mondo ungʼe malongʼo, owetena, ni kuom Yesu ema iyalonue yor weyo richo.
Mogik jowetena, beduru mamor kuom Ruoth! Aonge gi pek moro manyalo tama nwoyonu weche mane asendikonu motelo, nikech wechegi obedonu ohinga mar konyruok.
To ka ngʼato odenyo, to ber mondo ochiem dala, mondo kik chokruok ma ubedogo kelnu kum. Weche modongʼ anawachnu ka abiro.
Pilato nowachonegi niya, “Kaweuru un uwegi udhi ungʼadne bura kaka chiku dwaro.” To jo-Yahudi nodagi, kagiwacho niya, “Wan waonge gi teko mar ngʼado ne ngʼato buch tho.”
Owinjore uket chunyu kuom mich madongo. Koro abiro nyisou yo moro maber moloyo.

Jadolo maduongʼ ma kamano ema nyalo konyowa nikech oler, oonge ketho, kendo chilo moro onge kuome. Bende Nyasaye osetingʼe mokete kar kende kopoge gi joricho, kendo osetingʼe malo kuma bor moyombo polo.
Anyalo timo gik moko duto kuom Kristo mamiya teko.
En dwaro Nyasaye mondo ubed jomaler. Nyasaye dwaro ni ubed mabor gi timbe mag terruok
Timuru kinda kuom lemo, kurito gi paro moyawore, kendo kugoyo erokamano ni Nyasaye.
Kane Musa owinjo wachno, noringo odhi Midian, kama nodakie kaka japiny moro mi onywolo yawuowi ariyo.
Dichwo to ok owinjore oum wiye nikech en ranyisi mar Nyasaye gi duongʼne; dhako to en ranyisi mar duongʼ mar dichwo.
Weuru mondo kwe mar Kristo obed jaloch e chunyu kaka fuondi ringruok achiel, noluongu e kwe, omiyo gouru erokamano.
Ne en gima kare mondo Nyasaye manochweyo kendo morito gik moko duto oket jachak warruok margi kare chuth e yor sandruok, mondo eka okel nyithi Nyasaye duto oyud pok mar duongʼne.
Angʼo makelo goruok gi dhawo e kindu? Donge gia kuom gombou makedo matek e chunyu?
Wachore e lela ni nitie terruok e dieru, kendo ni en kit terruok ma kata jopiny ok tim; nikech ngʼato terore gi chi wuon.
Onge tem museneno mopogore gi ma ji duto neno. Nyasaye rito singruokne, ok obi yie mondo otemu mohingo tekreu. To e sa ma itemoueno, obiro miyou yo munyalo tonygo mondo ubed gi teko mar timo sinani.
Angʼeyo maber ni bangʼ ka asea, ondiegi mangemo biro monjou, kendo ok giniwe kweth Nyasaye ngangʼ.
Kuom mano, wasebedo ka wapwoyou e kind kanisa Nyasaye, kawanyisogi kuom kindau kod yieu motegno momiyo udhil e dier sand kod tem duto muyudo.
Onge ngʼama oseneno Nyasaye, to ka waherore ngʼato gi ngʼato to Nyasaye odak eiwa, kendo herane chopo kare eiwa.
An Paulo, andikonu kaka jaote ma ok oor gi teko kata dwaro mar dhano, to mana gi teko mar Yesu Kristo gi Nyasaye Wuora mane ochiere oa kuom joma otho.
Paruru kuome, en ma notimo kinda ka joricho kedo kode, mondo kik ujogi mi chunyu aa.
Koseriw-wa kode kamano e thone, to ochuno ni ibiro riwwa kode bende e chierne.
Owacho kendo niya, “Moruru un joma ok jo-Yahudi kaachiel gi joge,”
Roho Maler wacho ni e ndalo giko jomoko nowe yie mi giluw weche chunje mawuondo ji kod puonj mayoreyore mag jochiende.
Par ne ji mondo ochiw luor ne jotelo. Nyisgi mondo giwinj chik kendo mondo gibed moikore ne timo gimoro amora maber,
To jogi wigi wil mar oyiem ni chon gi lala wach Nyasaye nomiyo polo obedo kendo piny ne ochwe koa kuom pi kendo pi ema nochweyego.
Nikech Kristo notho ni richo dichiel kendo mogik, ngʼat makare notho kar joma richo mondo okelu ir Nyasaye. Ne oneg ringre, to kata kamano nomiye bedo mangima kuom Roho.
Dine obedo nigi maber moloyo ka dine ok gingʼeyo yor ngima makare, moloyo ngʼeyogo eka bangʼe gidok chien giweyo chik mane omigi.
Wachikou jowetewa e nying Ruoth Yesu Kristo mondo upogru gi jowete ma budho abudha kendo ok lu puonj mane uyudo kuomwa.
Emomiyo mana kaka richo nodonjo e piny nikech ngʼato achiel, kendo richono nokelo tho; e kaka tho nobiro kuom ji duto, nikech ji duto noketho,
Yie ema nomiyo giloyo pinjeruodhi kendo girito ji gi bura makare, mi giyudo gik ma Nyasaye nosingo. Ne giumo dho sibuoche,
isandowa, to ok jwangʼwa; idwaro negwa, to ok tiekwa.
Un joma terore! Donge ungʼeyo ni hero piny en chayo Nyasaye? Ngʼato angʼata moyiero e chunye mondo obed osiep piny doko jasik Nyasaye.
Kaka Roho Maler nosegengʼogi ni kik giyal Injili e piny Asia, Paulo gi lange nowuotho e gwengʼ Frugia gi Galatia.
To ngima makare maa kuom yie to wacho niya, “Kik iwach e chunyi ni, ‘Ere ngʼama didhinwa e polo malo?’ ” (tiende ni, mondo olor Kristo piny),
Malaika mokwongo nodhi mopuko tape e piny, mi adhonde malich mangʼwe marach ne omako ji duto mane nigi kido mar ondiek malich kendo mane lamo gima ket kode.

E sa mane okawoe kitabuno gik mangima angʼwen ka gi Jodongo piero ariyo gangʼwen-go ne opodho auma e nyim Nyarombo. Moro ka moro kuomgi ne nigi nyatiti kod tewni mag dhahabu ma ubani opongʼo. Tewni mag ubanigo ochungʼ kar lemo mar jomaler.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato moyie ni Yesu e Kristo en nyathi Nyasaye, kendo ngʼama ohero Wuoro ohero nyathine bende.
Kik wawuondre kendwa wawegi, ka wasiko mana ka wakwinyore kendo wagombo gige jowadwa.
Kik idhaw gi ngʼama duongʼ gi dwol makwiny, to wuo kode mamuol giluor mana ka wuonu monywoli. Kaw yawuowi matindo ka oweteni,
Daguru e ngima maber e kind jopiny makia Nyasaye mondo kata ka gihangonu ni un joketho to gine mana timbeu mabeyo mi gimi Nyasaye duongʼ chiengʼ ma obiro ngʼadoe bura.
kuom timo kinda, naketo chunya mar sando kanisa, kuom rito chik ne an ngʼama ler, maonge ketho.
Kane ononogi mondo ongʼe ni en sa mane mane wuode ochangoe, negiwachone niya, “Midhusi nyoro oweye kar sa abiriyo.”

Ne en odiechiengʼ motelo ne odiechieng Pasaka. Nikech jo-Yahudi ne ok dwar mondo owe ringre Yesu koliero e msalaba chiengʼ Sabato, ne gikwayo Pilato mondo one ni otur tiende joma nogur, kendo olor ringregi.

Kochakore e sechego, Pilato notemo gonyo Yesu, kata kamano jo-Yahudi nomedo kok matek kagiwacho niya, “Kiweyo ngʼatni thuolo modhi, to ok in osiep Kaisar. Ngʼato ka ngʼato ma ketore ni en ruoth, kedo gi Kaisar.”
“Kik uwe chunyu chandre. Yieuru kuom Nyasaye, to An bende yieuru kuoma.
ma ok obwogu e yo moro amora, gi joma kwedou. Mano biro bedonegi ranyisi ni ibiro tiekgi, to un ibiro resu kendo Nyasaye ema biro timo mano.
Un ne ok uyiera, an ema nayierou kendo aketou mondo udhi unyag olemo, ma en olemo masiko. Eka Wuora biro miyou gimoro amora mukwayo e nyinga.

Yie ema nomiyo Abel otimo misango maber ne Nyasaye moloyo misango mar Kain. Yieneno nomiyo Nyasaye oyie kode kaka ngʼama kare, nikech Nyasaye owuon norwako misangoneno. Abel pod wuoyo nyaka chil kawuono nikech yie mane en-gono, kata obedo ni nosetho.
Kuom mano, ji onego okwanwa kaka jotich Kristo, kendo kaka jorit weche mopondo mag Nyasaye.
kendo sulwe manie polo nolwar e piny mana kaka olemo mag ngʼowu mapok ochiek lwar koa kuom yadhe ka yamo mager kudho.
Kuom mano, osiepena mageno, ringuru ua kuom nyiseche manono.
Kik uyie richo lou, to louru richo gi tim maber.
Par nigi wechegi kisiemogi e nyim Nyasaye ni giwe dhawo kuom weche maonge ohala maketho mana chuny joma winjogi.
Suduru but Nyasaye, eka nosud butu. Luokuru lweteu, un jorichogi, kendo pwodhuru chunyu, un joma nigi paro ariyogi.
To ka udewo wangʼ ji to utimo richo kendo bura oseloyou kaka joketh chik.
Nimar Nyasaye ne ok oluongowa mondo wadag e ngima mar dwanyruok, to ne oluongowa mondo wadag e ngima maler.
Mirimb Nyasaye koro fwenyore koa e polo kuom ji duto motamore lame, kendo matimo richo ka gigengʼo adiera gi timbegi maricho.
Osiepena mageno waherreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato nikech hera aa kuom Nyasaye. Ngʼat man gihera en nyathi Nyasaye kendo ongʼeyo Nyasaye.
Ngʼato angʼata mawacho niwuotho e ler to mon gi wadgi pod osiko e mudho.
Ka iyanyou nikech nying Kristo to kwanreuru kaka joma ogwedhi, nikech Roho mar duongʼ kendo mar Nyasaye ni kuomu.
Paulo nomosogi, eka nonyisogi weche duto kuom gik mane Nyasaye osetimo e kind joma ok jo-Yahudi e tichne mar lando Injili.
Ere ngʼato kuomu ka manyalo ngʼengʼa ni an jaricho? To ka awachonu adier to angʼo momiyo udagi yie kuoma?
Ruoth medo wacho niya, “Richogi kod timbegi mamono ok anachak apar kendo.”
Nimar kuome usebedo momew e yore duto kuom weche ma uwacho kod ngʼeyo ma un-go,
Owetena, ajiwou kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo, kendo kuom hera mar Roho, mondo uriwru koda e nyagruokna, kulamona Nyasaye.
Ogandano nodwoko niya, “Jachien ni kodi! En ngʼa madwaro negi?”
Nyasaye nochiwe kaka misango mar golo richo, nikech yie kuom rembe. Ne otimo ma mondo onyis timne makare, nikech e kinde motelo, Nyasaye ne ok odewo richo mane ji osetimo nikech kechne.
To nikech piny ne ngʼich, jotich gi jotelo nochungʼ kolworo mach manoyudo gisemoko mondo gio. Petro bende nochungʼ kodgi kanyo kaoyo mach.
Manreuru gi gige lweny duto mag Nyasaye, mondo eka uchungʼ motegno kutangʼ ne wuond mar Jachien.
Petro nopenje niya, “Ruoth, angʼo momiyo ok anyal luwi sani? Aikora chiwo ngimana nikech in.”
Eka kwe mar Nyasaye modhiero ji duto ngʼeyo norit chunyu gi pachu ka un kuom Kristo Yesu.
Lep achielni ema wapakogo Ruodhwa kendo Wuonwa, en bende ema wakwongʼogo ji mochwe e kit Nyasaye.
Ok awuo kuom jopiny mapok oyie ma terore, kata ma jowuoro, kata ma jomecho, kata malamo nyiseche manono, nikech mano to dichunwa ni wadar e pinyni.
“Kata mana an awuon naketo chunya mar timo duto manyalo mondo akwed nying Yesu ja-Nazareth.
Wengegi rango mon mana gigombo mar terruok kendo richo mitnegi ma ok giwe. Giywayo mon ma yiegi yomyom mondo gitimgo richo kendo gipongʼ gi wuoro. Jogi gin joma okwongʼ adier!
Jatij ngʼato ok en jakwath ma wuon rombe. Omiyo koneno ondiek kabiro, to oringo oweyo rombe kanyo. Eka ondiek monjo rombe kendo keyogi.
Jowetena mageno, winjuru wachni malongʼo ni: Ji duto onego bed mapiyo e winjo wach, kik urikni e wuoyo kendo kik ubed joma igi wangʼ piyo,
Kamano bende e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko mondo joma lando Injili oyud konyruok duto mag ngimagi koa kuom Injili ma giyalo.
Asebiro e piny kaka ler, mondo ngʼato angʼata moyie kuoma kik sik e mudho.
Bangʼe Yesu noyude e hekalu mowachone niya, “Winji, koro isedoko mangima. We richo, nono to gimoro marach moloyo biro timoreni.”
Timuru gik moko duto gihera.
“Ka uhera to ubiro timo gima achikou.

Neuru ni ok utamoru winjo dwond Jal ma wuoyo kodu. Nikech ka gin bende ne ok gitony kane gidagi winjo dwond Musa mane osiemogi e piny-ka, wan to koro dwatony nade ka wadagi winjo Jal masiemowa gie polo?
Chon kane pod ukia Nyasaye, ne un wasumbini mag gik ma ok onego kwan kaka nyiseche.
Kane Nyasaye ooro Jatichne, to noore mokwongo ne un, mondo ogwedhu, ka oloko ngʼato ka ngʼato weyo yorene maricho.”
“Wan joneno kuom gik moko duto mane otimo e piny jo-Yahudi kendo ei Jerusalem. Neginege ka gigure e msalaba,
Jowetena, asayou e nying Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo, mondo un duto uwinjru ngʼato gi ngʼato. Kik pogruok moro amora bedi e kindu, to beduru kuriworu maonge pogruok, ka un gi dwaro achiel kod paro achiel.
Chon ne upogoru gi Nyasaye, kendo ne un wasike kuom pachu nikech timbe maricho mane utimo.
Ring iwe gombo maricho mag jomatindo kendo ket chunyi mar luwo ngima maler, gi yie, gihera, kod kwe, kaachiel gi joma lamo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chuny maler.
Ka osechieru gi Kristo, to keturu chunyu kuom gik manie polo, kuma Kristo obetie e bat korachwich mar Nyasaye.
