Malaika mokwongo nogoyo turumbetene, to pe gi mach mokikore gi remo ema ne owuok, kendo nopuk e piny. To bath piny moromo achiel kuom adek nowangʼ, kendo achiel kuom adek mar yien bende maromo kamano nowangʼ gi lum mangʼich duto nowangʼ.
kagiwacho niya, “Wagoyoni erokamano, yaye Ruoth Nyasaye Maratego! Jal mantie, kendo Jal mane nitie, nikech isekawo teko mari maduongʼ, mi koro ichako locho.
Yesu nodwoke niya, “Ka dine ingʼe mich Nyasaye kendo ingʼe jal makwayi pi mondo omodhi, to dikwaye pi momiyi pi mar ngima.”
Ka Kristo, ma en ngimau nofwenyre, to un bende unubi kode e duongʼne maler.
To magi ondiki mondo uyie ni Yesu e Kristo ma Wuod Nyasaye, kendo mondo ka uyie kamano, to ubed gi ngima e nyinge.
Wan to wan jo-Nyasaye omiyo joma ongʼeyo Nyasaye winjowa, to ngʼat ma ok ngʼat Nyasaye ok winjwa. Ma e yo mwangʼeyogo Roho mar adier gi Roho mar miriambo.

Jogi gin mbelni e sewni magu mag hera, kendo gichiemo kodu ka wengegi tek, gin jokwath mapidhore kendgi! Gichalo rumbi ma yamo tero to ok kel koth kendo gichalo olemo mopidhi kinde opon bende gichalo gi yien ma ok nyag olemo kendo mopudh gi tiendegi, gionge tich.
Kuom mano, ji nokelo joma tuo mi giketogi e bath yore ka gipielogi e kitendini kod pere, mondo kata mana tipo mar Petro oum moko kuomgi kokalo butgi.
Ewi mago duto tingʼuru yie maru ka okumba mugengʼogo aserni makakni ka mach moa kuom ngʼat marach.
Gimoro amora ma utimo, to timuru gi chunyu duto ka gima utimo ni Ruoth to ok ni dhano,
Neuru ni onge ngʼato kuomu ma jachode, kata ngʼama ochayo Nyasaye kaka Esau ma wach chiemo michamo dichiel nomiyo owilo duongʼne kaka wuowi makayo.
To ne gikokne matek, kagiwacho riat niya, “Ooyo, ok en! Barabas ema imiwa!” Barabas ne en jamecho.
ginibed andhoke, joma mwomore, josunga, joma ohero mor moloyo Nyasaye,
Emomiyo Nyasaye bende notingʼe malo moloyo, kendo nomiye nying moloyo nyinge duto,
Ne ok waluwo sigendini ma dhano ochuogo gi riekone kane wanyisou teko kod biro mar Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo, to wawegi ne wan joneno mar duongʼne.

Barupenego duto ondiko machalre, kowuoyo kuom wechegi. Barupene otingʼo weche moko ma tiendgi tek ma joma kia kaachiel gi jo-hubagabaga gwenyo, mana kaka gigwenyo Ndiko mamoko bende, to timgino biro kelonegi chandruok.
To ka joote Paulo gi Barnaba nowinjo wachno, ne giyiecho lepgi mi giringo matek ka gichomo ogandano, ka gikok niya,
Nimar anyisou ni Kristo osedoko jatich jo-Yahudi mondo ochop adiera mar Nyasaye, mondo omi singruok mane omi kwerewa otimre,
Ka ngʼato angʼata okawore ni en jalemo, to ok orito lewe motegno to owuondore kende, kendo lemone onge tiende.
Paruru weche ma nawachonu ni, ‘Onge jatich maduongʼ moloyo ruodhe motiyone.’Omiyo ka an ema gisesanda, to un bende gibiro sandou. Ka gimako puonjna, to puonju bende gibiro mako.
Yesu nowacho ni jo-Yahudi manoyie kuome niya, “Ka usiko kumako puonjna, eka un jopuonjrena adier.
“Eka kech maduongʼ nomako piny Misri gi Kanaan kendo nokelo chandruok maduongʼ e piny ma kata kwerewa ne ok nyal yudo chiemo.
Ne abedo mamor kuom ngʼeyo ni nyithindi moko wuotho e adiera ka giluwo chik mane wayudo kuom Wuoro.
Ka ngʼato ok orito wedene, to moloyo ka ok orito joode owuon, to osekwedo yie marwa, kendo orach moloyo japiny.
to wasuduru but Nyasaye gi chuny mar adier, kendo ka wan gi yie ma ok wariwo gi kiawa, bende ka chunywa manyisowa ni wan joketho opwodhi kendo ka ringrewa olwoki gi pi maliw.
Negisewinjo mana wach niya, “Ngʼat ma yande sandowa bende tinde yalo kuom yie ma notemo ketho e kinde mosekalo.”
Koro yieuru koda mondo uchamie gimoro matin mondo ubed mangima. Awachonu ni onge ngʼato kata achiel kuomu mabiro wito kata mana yie wiye achiel.”
Isetimo kinda kendo isehori e bwo chandruok nikech nyinga, to ok iseol.
Puonj jodongo mondo obed joma obidhore, ma ok ohero oyuma, kendo moritore, bende man-gi yie mar adier gihera kod kinda.
E kinde mokalo Nyasaye ne ok odewo fuwo machal kamano, to koro sani osegolo chik ni ji duto kamoro amora mondo olokre owe richo.
Min Yesu gi nyamin min-gi, gi Maria ma chi Kiliopa kod Maria ma aa Magdala nochungʼ but msalaba.
Kendo orwakore gi kandho molingʼ e remo, to nyinge en Wach Nyasaye.
Kuom mano, bed motangʼ mondo thuolo ma in-go mar chiemo kata mar weyo chiemo kik lokre kidi mar chwanyruok ni joma yiegi yomyom.
To kuom chier mane Nyasaye ochierego oa kuom joma otho, mondo kik otow, to ondikie kama: “ ‘Anamiu gweth maler kendo madier, mane asingone Daudi.’
Odiechiengʼno unungʼe ni an ei Wuora; kendo ni un e iya, kendo an eiu.
Ka warito chike Nyasaye eka wabedo gi ratiro ni wangʼeye.
Ne asenyisou ni ubiro tho e richou. Ka utamoru yie ni an ngʼama asebedo ka awachonu ni an, to ubiro tho e richou adier.”
Bende ne aneno dhakono komer gi remb jomaler mag Nyasaye, remb jogo mane ohulo ni Yesu e Ruoth. Kane anene ne awuoro ahinya.
Ungʼeyo ni bangʼe achien ka nodwaro mondo wuon mare ogwedhe to ne okwede. Noywak malit gi pi wangʼe mondo oyud gwethni to mano ok ne nyal loko paro mar wuon-gi kata matin.
Ji mathoth mane ni e sawono ne wuoyo kuom Yesu. Jomoko nowacho niya, “En ngʼat maber.” To jomoko kuomgi to nowacho niya, “Ooyo, owuondo ji.”
Teko Nyasaye ne ni kodgi, omiyo ji mathoth noyie kendo olokore kuom Ruoth.
To wawuoyo kaka joma Nyasaye owuon ema opwodho kendo oyiego kaka jorit Injili. Ok watem mondo wabed malongʼo ne dhano, to wadwaro ni wabed malongʼo mana ne Nyasaye ma nono chunjewa.
To erokamano ni Nyasaye. Omiyowa loch kuom Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo!
Dhako ma chwore otho keto genone duto kuom Nyasaye, kendo osiko olamo odiechiengʼ gotieno kokwayo Nyasaye mondo okonye.
Nyaka sani pok ukwayo gimoro amora e nyinga. Kwauru to nomiu, eka nubed mamor chuth.
Dibed ni ne in misumba kane Nyasaye oluongi? Kik mano chandi, makmana kapo ni inyalo yudo yor bedo thuolo, to tim kamano moloyo.
Magi e joma kelo pogruok e kindu, kendo gombogi mag ringruok ema chikogi, gionge Roho.
Awuoro ahinya kaka uselokoru piyo piyo nono, mi uweyo Jal mane oluongou kuom ngʼwono mar Kristo, kendo koro uluwo Injili mopogore gi mane opuonju,
Temuru matek mondo udag gi ji duto gi kwe, kendo mondo ngimau obed maler, nikech ka ngʼato onge gi ngima maler to ok none Ruoth.
Nowachonegi niya, “Boluru gogo mau yo bat korachwich mar yie, to ubiro mako rech.” Kane gitimo kamano, ywayo gogo nyaka ei yie notamogi, nikech rech ne ngʼeny mohewogi ywayo.
Bedo ni ngʼato oter nyangu kata ok oter nyangu ok en gimoro. Gima duongʼ en rito Chike Nyasaye.
Ka en jiwo ji, to mondo ojiw ji; ka en chiwo ne joma ochando, to mondo ochiw gi ngʼwono; ka en telo, to mondo orit ji gi kinda; ka en kecho ji, to mondo otime komor.
mi openjogi niya, “Bende ne uyudo Roho Maler chiengʼ mane uyie kuom Yesu?” Negidwoke niya, “Ooyo, kata mana winjo pok wawinjo ni nitie gimoro ni Roho Maler.”
Ka ngʼato angʼata otamore luwo weche mawandikonu e baruwani to ngʼiuru ngʼatno maber. Kik uriwru kode, mondo eka wiye okuodi kuom timne mobam.
Jowetena, tiend gima awacho ema: Ringruok gi remo ok nyal chamo girkeni mar pinyruodh Nyasaye kendo gima tow ok nyal rwakore gi gima ok tow.
Weuru tiyo ni chiemo marumo, to tiuru ni chiemo masiko nyaka chop uyud ngima mochwere, ma Wuod Dhano biro miyou. Nyasaye Wuoro oseketo kido mare kuome manyiso ni oyie kode.”
To kata ka ukwayo Nyasaye, to ok uyud gik mukwayo nikech ukwayo gi paro maricho mondo utimgo dwarou uwegi.
ka udwoko erokamano kinde duto ni Nyasaye Wuoro kuom gik moko duto e nying Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo.
Paruruane kuom Ibrahim: “Ibrahim noyie kuom Nyasaye kendo mano nomiyo okwane kaka ngʼama kare.”
Dalano ok dwar chiengʼ kata dwe mondo orienyne, nikech duongʼ Nyasaye ema miye ler, kendo Nyarombo e tache.
To kata kamano, un ok chiku gi kido mar richo, to Roho ema chikou, ka en adier ni Roho mar Nyasaye odak eiu. Kendo ka ngʼato onge gi Roho mar Kristo ok en ngʼat Kristo.
To gin bende, ka ok gisiko e tamruok yie, to ibiro chomogi kendo, nimar Nyasaye nigi teko mar chomogi kendo.
Miriambo ne ok owuok e dhogi, bende gionge gi ketho moro amora.

Kata kamano, ayie ni alamo Nyasach kwerewa, kendo an achiel kuom joma oluwo Yor Kristo, ma jo-Yahudi luongo ni kanyakla mar joma ongʼanyo. Ayie gi gik moko duto mowinjore gi Chik Musa kod gik mane Jonabi ondiko,
Kik ubed gi gowi mar ngʼato, makmana gowi mar hera, nimar ngʼama ohero wadgi osechopo Chik.
Liet mager mar chiengʼ nowangʼogi to negidhi nyime mana giyanyo nying Nyasaye man-gi teko mar gengʼo masichego, kendo negitamore hulo richogi mondo gimiye duongʼ.
Ne en gi ohinga maduongʼ kendo mabor man-gi dhorangeye apar gariyo kendo man-gi malaike apar gariyo e dhorangeyego. Bende e dhorangeyego nondikie nying ogendini apar gariyo mag Israel.
Kristo to noresowa kuom kwongʼ ma Chik kelo, ka en owuon nobedonwa kaka ngʼama okwongʼ nikech wan, mana kaka ondiki niya, “Okwongʼ ngʼato ka ngʼato molier e yath.”
Nyaka bed ni usewinjo kaka ne achal kane pod aluwo kit lemo mar jo-Yahudi, kaka ne asando kanisa mar Nyasaye gi gero mokalo apima, kendo ne atemo mondo atieke chuth.
Ne omako thuol mangʼongono tiende ni thuol machon, ma en Jachien kata Satan matek, kendo notweye kuom higni alufu achiel.
Ne nitie ngʼat moro miluongo ni Simon. Ngʼatni nosebedo katimo timbe jwok e dala mar Samaria, kendo timbene nomako dho ji duto. Nosungore ni en ngʼama lich,
Adwaro ngʼeyo Kristo kod teko miyudo kuom chierne kendo ayie riwora kode e sandne ka amedo bedo machal kode pile kuom thone,
Kik irikni yieyo lwedo kuom ji, kendo kik iriwri e richo ji mamoko. Ritri mondo ngimani osik kaler.
Kamano bende puonj mon madongo mondo kit ngimagi obed ranyisi maber, ma ok jokuoth, kata joma ohero madho kongʼo, to nyaka gibed gi puonj mabeyo.
Kuom mano, ngʼat monyuomo nyako mangilino otimo maber, to ngʼat ma ok onywome otimo maber moloyo.
To kik uchik mana itu ni winjo wach kende, nono to uwuondoru kendu uwegi to timuru mana gima Muma puonjo.
Bangʼ mano Yesu nodhi koni gi koni e piny Galili, kotemo bedo mabor gi Judea nikech jo-Yahudi ne rite kuno mondo ginege.
En e chakruok mar ngimau ei Kristo Yesu, mane obedonwa rieko moa kuom Nyasaye, tiende ni tim makare, pwodhruok, kod resruok.
Bangʼ timo kamano, noolo pi e karaya bangʼe ochako luoko tiend jopuonjrene, kendo noyweyo tiendegi gi taulo mane oyudo otweyo e nungone.
Ne asando joma luwo Yor Kristo mi anego moko kuomgi, to ne amako chwo gi mon mi atero e od twech.
Omiyo pogruok nobedo e kind ji nikech wach Yesu.

Beduru jokwath mag kweth Nyasaye moseketo e lwetu mondo uriti. Ritgiuru kaka jorit, ok nikech ngʼato ochunou, to nikech chunyu ohero, kaka Nyasaye dwaro ni utim. Kik ubed jokwath mondo uyudie ohala, to timuru kamano nikech uhero.
Lit mar tho en richo, to teko mar richo en chik.
To neuru pok uchulo misach jotich mane otiyonu e puotheu kendo ywak mag jokeyogo osechopo e it Jehova Nyasaye Maratego.
Emomiyo weuru timbe maricho duto kod wuondruok duto, kod dondruok, gi nyiego kod kuoth e yo moro amora.
Chik otweyo dhako gi chwore ndalo duto ma chwore ngima. To ka chwore otho, to en thuolo mondo onywome gi dichwo moro amora mohero, makmana ni nyaka nyuome gi ngʼat kuom Ruoth.
mosebayo yo moweyo adiera. Giseweyo adiera ka gipuonjo ni chier osetimore, kendo giketho yie mar ji moko.
Nikech kuom Kristo Yesu onge pogruok bed ni ngʼato oter nyangu kata ok otere. Gimoro achiel kende madwarore en yie matiyo kuom hera.
kendo bangʼ ka nosekete kare chuth to nodoko wuon warruok mochwere ma ji duto mawinjo wachne yudo.
To koro kuom wach choko chiwo ni jo-Nyasaye; to awachoe kama: Timuru gima ne akone kanisa man Galatia mondo otim.
Un mon winjuru chwou mana kaka dine uluoro Ruoth.
Yesu nochako owuoyo kodgi, kowacho niya, “An e ler mar piny, ngʼato angʼata ma luwa ok nyal wuotho e mudho, to enobed gi ler mar ngima.”
To osiepena mageno, paruru gik mane joote mag Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo okoro chon.
bende ok tine gi lwet dhano ka gima odwaro gimoro kuom dhano nikech en owuon ema ochiwo ne dhano, ngima gi muya mi yweyo kod gik moko duto.
Wayie gi nend dhano, to nend Nyasaye ema duongʼ moloyo nikech en neno ma Nyasaye owuon osewacho kuom Wuode.
Kar timo kamano, to rwakreuru gi Ruoth Yesu Kristo, kendo kik uchan e pachu kaka unyalo timo gik ma ringruok gombo.
Yie ema nomiyo ohinga mag Jeriko opodho piny, bangʼ ka jo-Israel nosewuotho ka lwore kuom ndalo abiriyo.
Nyasaye nomiyo Paulo otimo honni madongo,
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Awachonu adier, ni ngʼato ka ngʼato matimo richo, en misumba richo.
Osiepena mageno, ka Nyasaye noherowa kamano, to wan bende waherre ngʼato gi ngʼato.
Isenyisa yore mag ngima; kendo inipongʼa gi mor mogundho, ka an e nyimi.’
Ket chunyi kuom somo Ndiko ne ji e lela, kendo kuom jiwo ji kendo puonjo ji nyaka chopi abi.
Pile weche matek olworowa koni gi koni, to ok chunywa ool; wadhier nono, to ok wajogi;
To jomoko kuomgi nojarogi kawacho niya, “Jogi osemadho kongʼo mangʼeny momerogi.”
Ohingano noger gi jaspa, to dalano noger gi dhahabu lilo marieny ka kio maler.
Malaike abiriyo motingʼo masiche abiriyo nowuok e hekalu. Ne girwakore gi lewni maler mapakni kendo manyilni to negitweyo okanda mar dhahabu e korgi.
Gwedhuru joma sandou; gwedhgiuru agwedha, kik ukwongʼ-gi.
Tiendene ne pakni ka mula mopwodhi gi mach, bende dwonde ne mor ka pi mopongʼ mawuo.
Asehulonegi nyingi, kendo pod abiro medo nyiso ji ngʼama in, mondo hera miherago obed kuomgi, kendo an awuon bende abed kuomgi.”
Ka Wuode owuon ema ne ok okecho, to nochiwonwago wan duto, koro en angʼo ma dimone miyowa gik moko duto, kaachiel kode kuom ngʼwonone?
Ne giwachonu niya, “E ndalo giko joma jaro ji nobedie ma noluw gombogi giwegi maricho.”
to kik usungru ne bede yath mamoko. To kapo ni utimo kamano, to paraneuru wachni: Ok un ema utingʼo tiend yath, to tiend yath ema otingʼou.
Ok wawach kamano nikech watemo bedo gi teko kuom yie maru, to watiyo kodu kaachiel mondo uchungʼ motegno e yie maru ka umor.
Ngʼat moro ma nyinge Lazaro ne tuo. Ne en ja-Bethania, dala gi Maria gi Maritha nyamin mare.
Omiyo ngʼato angʼata motamore winjo puonjni ok otamore winjo dhano, to otamore winjo Nyasaye owuon mamiyou Roho Maler.
Ma e kaka unyalo ngʼeyo Roho mar Nyasaye: Roho ma hulo ni Yesu Kristo nobiro e ringruok en Roho moa kuom Nyasaye,
Mano e kaka jogi bende chalo. Lek ma gileko dwanyo ringregi kendo jogi odagi teko ma Ruoth nigo kendo giwuoyo marach kuom joma nigi duongʼ e polo.
Nyaka olokre owe timbe maricho mi otim tim maber; nyaka omany kwe kendo oluwe.

Mano biro timore mana ka udhi nyime e yieu, kendo kuchungʼ motegno ma ok uyiengni uweyo geno mar Injili. Ma e Injili mane uwinjo, kendo makoro oseyal ni chwech duto e bwo polo, kendo ma an Paulo asebedo ka atiyone.
Gikanyono ne gikwanyo kite mondo gichielgo Yesu, to nopondonigi, mopusore oa e laru mar hekalu.
kendo mondo urwakru gi dhano manyien, mochwe mondo ochal gi Nyasaye kuom ngima makare mar adier kendo maler.
Ngʼeyo tiend wachni dwaro kinda kod dhil mar joma rito chike mag Nyasaye, kendo osiko koyie kuom Yesu.
To Nyasaye nochiere oa kuom joma otho,
“An e jakwath maber. Jakwath maber chiwo ngimane ne rombe.
Adier usewinjo kaka Nyasaye nomiya tijni mar ngʼwono nikech un,
Siem ngʼat makelo pogruok dichiel, to kisesiemo ngʼat makelo pogruok diriyo to pogri kode chuth.
Wechegi nomedo kelo pogruok e kind jo-Yahudi.
Ngʼat moyie ni wechene gin adier, biro ngʼeyo malongʼo ni Nyasaye en ja-adiera.
Emomiyo, osiepena mageno, ka pod urito odiechiengʼno to temuru matek kaka unyalo mondo ubed jomaler maonge ketho e nyim Nyasaye, kendo beduru gi kwe kode.
Mogik, jowetewa, lemnwauru mondo Wach Ruoth Yesu olandre piyo piyo kendo mondo ji omi wachno duongʼ, mana kaka notimore e dieru.
nikech wangʼeyo ni Jal mane ochiero Ruoth Yesu oa kuom joma otho biro chierowa wan bende gi Yesu, kendo obiro kelowa kaachiel gi un, e nyime.
Ka ngʼato kuomu tuo, to onego oluong jodong kanisa mondo olamne kendo owire gi mo e nying Ruoth.
“Kane Musa koro ja-higni piero angʼwen, noparo e chunye mondo odhi olim owetene ma jo-Israel.
Daher mar nyisi ni jo-Yahudi nomako ngʼatni kendo negidwaro nege, to ne aoro jolweny mondo okonye, nikech ne ayudo wach ni en ja-Rumi.
Koko nolandore e dala duto kendo negimako Gayo gi Aristarko ma jo-Makedonia mane jowuodh Paulo kendo ne gimwomore kuomgi ka gichiko pawgi mar tugo.
Ne ukwedo Ngʼama Ler kendo makare, to ukwayo mondo ogonynu janek.
Ne ok otimonigi gima opogore gi ma notimonwa, nikech gin bende nopwodho chunygi kuom yie.
Ngʼato ka ngʼato nyaka nonre mokwongo, kapok ochamo makati kata ometho e kikombe.
Emomiyo, jowetena mageno, chunguru motegno. Kik uyie gimoro oyiengu. Chiwreuru chuth kinde duto ni tich Ruoth, nikech ungʼeyo ni tich mutiyo matek ne Ruoth ok obedo kayiem nono.
Kuom mano, akwayou mondo ulu timna.
Nyasaye nochano gi riekone ni piny ok nyal ngʼeyo Kristo gi riekone owuon, to nochano mana ni kuom fuwo mar wach mwalandoni ema owarogo joma oyie.
Kamano un bende mon luoruru chwou, mondo ka moko kuomgi pok oyie to gilokre, ok nikech wecheu to nikech timbeu maler,
Kuom mano, wan e joote mag Kristo, kendo Nyasaye owuon ema wuoyo kodu kokalo kuomwa. Wakwayou ka wachungʼ kar Kristo, mondo uwinjru kod Nyasaye.
Kata kamano, Nyasaye nochiere oa kuom joma otho, mi ogonye oa e rem malit mar tho, nikech kata mana tho ne ok nyal loye.
Donge gin ema gijaro Nying moluor mar Jal muyie kuome?
ngʼat ma ok ohero kongʼo, ngʼat ma ok ger, bende owinjore obed ngʼat mamuol, ma ok ohero dhawo kendo ma ok ohero pesa.
to ngʼato angʼata momodho pi mamiye ok nochak owinj riyo. Chutho, pi ma anamiye nodok soko mar pi e iye, mosiko ka bubni nyaka chop e ngima mochwere.”
To ka ngʼato orito chike Nyasaye to hera moherogo Nyasaye nenore kuome ratiro. To ma e kaka wanyalo bedo gi adiera ni wan ei Nyasaye:
Eka naneno jochiende adek machalo ogwende, ka wuok e dho thuol mangʼongono kendo e dho ondiek malich kendo e dho janabi mar miriambo.
Ka en adier ni umako chik mondik e Muma niya, “Her wadu kaka iherori iwuon,” to utimo maber.
Nikech ok wayal wach kuomwa wawegi, to wayalo Yesu Kristo kaka Ruoth, to wan wawegi wan jotich magu kuom Yesu.
Kik ngʼato wuondu. Ngʼeuru niya, “Bedo e lalruok kod joma richo ketho timbe mabeyo.”
Mad Nyasach kwe ma nochiero Ruodhwa Yesu, ma en Jakwath Maduongʼ mar rombe, kuom remo mar singruok mosiko,

To kata obedo ni angʼo motimore, to usik kudak e kit ngimau mapile mowinjore gi Injili mar Kristo. Kata ka abiro nenou, kata ka ok abiro, to adwaro winjo ni uchungʼ motegno gi chuny achiel kendo gi paro achiel mondo ukedni adiera mar Injili,
Kuom teko Nyasaye nochiero Ruoth Yesu oa kuom joma otho kendo wan bende obiro chierowa.
Mano emomiyo ajiwi mondo ichier mich ma in-go mane Nyasaye omiyi chiengʼ mane aketo lweta kuomi.
Mano emomiyo ne oyal Injili nyaka ni joma koro osetho, mondo eka obi ongʼadnegi bura, kaka nongʼad ni ji duto manie ringruok, to chunygi mondo obed mangima kaluwore gi dwaro Nyasaye.
Nongʼiewu gi nengo matek, omiyo kik ubed wasumbini mag ji.
Bende kik wangʼur, kaka moko kuomgi notimo, mi malaika mar tho nonegogi.
Nikech wan ok wachal gi ji mathoth mamoko, magajo wach Nyasaye mondo giyudie ohala. Wan to wan joma Nyasaye oseoro kendo wawacho adiera e nyime kuom Kristo.
Wan joma otegno nyaka watingʼ nyawo mar joma yomyom ma ok watimo mana gik mamorowa wan wawegi.
Kata mana an awuon an-gi adiera kuom Ruoth ni abiro biro iru machiegni.
Bangʼe ne aneno malaike angʼwen kochungʼ e tunge angʼwen mag piny, ka gimako yembe angʼwen mag piny, mondo gigengʼ yamo kik kudhi e piny kata e nam kata e yath moro amora.
Nikech ne un gi kinde malach mokadho, nutimo gik ma jopiny ohero timo kaka: dwanyruok, gombo, mer, tugo e thum, math mar anjawo kod lamo nyiseche manono.
Ka ngʼato moro amora dwaro hinyogi, to mach wuok e dhogi matieko wasikgi. Mano e kaka ngʼato moro amora madwaro hinyogi notho.
To Paulo nodwoko niya, “Owetena, ne ok angʼeyo ni en jadolo maduongʼ, nikech ondiki ni, ‘Kik iwuo marach kuom jatend jou.’”
To jogo ma timbegi richo, gi jojuogi, gi joma terore kod jonek, gi joma lamo nyiseche manono kod ji duto ma ohero miriambo kendo matimo gik ma ok adiera, duto nobed oko.

To kata kamano an kod weche matin kuomi: In kod jomoko kanyo maluwo puonj mar Balaam mane opuonjo Balak kaka onyalo ywayo jo-Israel mondo otim richo ka gichamo chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono kendo kuom richo mar chode.
Nyaka wadwokne Nyasaye erokamano kinde duto nikech un jowetewa kendo owinjore watim kamano nikech yie ma un-go medo bedo motegno, kendo hera muherorugo ngʼato gi ngʼato bende medore.
Ungʼeyo ni kane pod un jopiny, makia Nyasaye, to ne chalo nine oywau gi nyiseche manono ma ok wuo mi ulal.
Un chwo, heruru mondu, mana kaka Kristo bende nohero kanisa, mochiwore nikech en
Kik uchul ngʼato angʼata rach kar rach. Neuru ni utimo gima ji duto oyiego ni ber.
Emomiyo beduru joma obolore e bwo bad Nyasaye man-gi teko eka enotingʼu malo e kinde mowinjore.

To kata kamano, ok oseweyowa maonge yo ma dwangʼeyego. Osenyisou ngʼwonone komiyou koth moa e polo, kendo komiyo cham chieknu e kinde mowinjore; osebedo komiyou chiemo mathoth kendo opongʼo chunyu gi mor.”
Kamano bende, mondgi nyaka bed joma owinjore mi luor, kik gibed mon mohero kuoth, to owinjore gibed mon moritore kendo ma jo-adiera e weche duto.
Ne amiye kinde mondo olokre owe richo mar chode to notamore.

Noyudo en-gi mirima kod jo-Turo gi jo-Sidon. Kuom mano jo-Turo kod jo-Sidon ne joriwore mi giloso thuolo mar romo gi Herode. Ne gitudore gi Blasto, mane en jatich ruoth mogeno, eka negiyudo yo mar loso kwe gi ruoth, nikech chiembgi ne wuok e piny Herode.
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Aonge gi jachien. Wuora ema amiyo duongʼ to un to uchaya.
Yamb ahiti ne kudho, kendo pi nam ne gingore matek.
To aneno ni masiche mwaneno ndalogi tin ma ok dipim gi duongʼ mabiro fwenyorenwa.
Andikonu un nyithinda mageno nikech osewenu richou, kuom nying Yesu.
ma nowarowa kendo noluongowa mondo wadag e ngima maler. Mano ok nikech wasetimone gimoro maber to nikech dwarone owuon kuom ngʼwonone. Ne omiyowa ngʼwononi kuom Kristo Yesu kane piny pok obetie,

E sa ma jodolo madongo gi jotendgi nonene, negigoyo koko matek niya, “Gure! Gure!” To Pilato nowachonegi niya, “Kaweuru un uwegi udhi ugure. An ok ayudo ketho moro amora kuome minyalo ngʼadonego bura.”
Kuom wach warruokni ema ne jonabi onono matut kendo omanyo matek, kane gikoro wach gweth mane Nyasaye biro miyou.
Jo-miriambo mathoth, modagi yie ni Yesu Kristo ne obiro e ringruok, osebiro e piny. Ngʼat ma kamano en jawuond, kendo en e Jasik Kristo.
“Wasenwangʼo ni ngʼatni en jakel koko, kendo okelo dhawo e kind jo-Yahudi duto modak e pinyni. En jatend kanyakla mar joma ongʼanyo ma jo-Nazareth,

Chutho, mano kaka weche Nyasaye odhiero ngʼeyo kendo nigi duongʼ miwuoro: Kristo nobiro e ringruok, kendo Roho nonyiso ratiro ni oonge ketho, malaike ne onene, kendo wachne ne oyal e kind ogendini, ji ne oyie kuome e piny ngima, kendo ne otere malo e duongʼ mar Nyasaye.
Pe madongo dongo ma pek moro ka moro dirom kilo piero abich, noa e polo mogoyo ji. To ne giyanyo Nyasaye nikech masirano mar pe, nimar ne en masira marach moloyo!
Wan to warito gik ma Nyasaye osesingonwa, ma en polo manyien gi piny manyien, kama timbe makare ema noyudre.
Polo nolal nono ka kitabu mibano kendo gode duto gi chula duto nogol oa kuonde mane gintie.
Nikech Yesu Kristo notimo dwaro Nyasaye, omiyo koro osepwodhwa e richo kuom ringre mane ochiwo kaka misango dichiel kende.
Wadwokone Nyasaye erokamano kinde duto nikech un duto, kwaluongo nyingu e lemo magwa.
Eka faras machielo ma silwal nobiro. Ngʼat moidhe ne omi teko mondo ogol kwe e piny, mondo ji onegre kendgi. Ngʼatno nomi ligangla maduongʼ!
Ji duto manie tich mar misumba onego omi jotendgi luor mowinjore kodgi mondo nying Nyasaye kod puonj mwapuonjo kik yany.
Kik ngʼato kuomu wuond wadgi, nikech uselonyo kit dhano machon kod timbene duto,

Kata kamano, an kodi gi wach moro ma ok ber kuomi; iyie gi dhako miluongo ni Jezebel maluongore ni janabi madhako. En ema omiyo jotichna lal kopuonjogi mondo giterre, kendo mondo gicham chiemo motimgo misango ni nyiseche manono.
Nosewach e muma chon ni Nyasaye noket joma ok jo-Yahudi kare kuom yie kendo nolando Injili motelo ni Ibrahim niya, “Ogendini duto nogwedhi nikech in.”
Koso wiu osewil gi weche mag jip ma Nyasaye wuoyogo kodu kaka nyithinde niya, “Wuoda kik ikaw kum ma Ruoth kumigo ka gima nono, kendo kik chunyi jogi ka okweri,

Winjuru weche jotendu kendo beduru e bwo lochgi. Girito chunyu odiechiengʼ gotieno kaka joma nyaka nyis Nyasaye kaka uchal. Winjgiuru, eka tich ma gitiyo okelnigi mor to ok pek, nikech ka umiyo tich obedonegi mapek to un ema uhinyoru.
Nokedo gi pinje abiriyo mag jo-Kanaan moloyogi, mi opogo lopgi ni joge kaka girkeni.
Ka ngʼato opuonjo gima opogore ma ok owinjore gi puonj ma adier mag Ruodhwa Yesu Kristo kendo mamiyo ji luoro Nyasaye,
Omiyo ka ngʼato obironu mapuonjo gima opogore gi puonjni to kik iyiene odonj e odi kata rwake,
Nikech, mana kaka wan e achiel gi Kristo e sandruok duto mane oneno, e kaka wan kode e hoch mochiwo.
Ginine malit! Giseluwo tim Kain, kendo gisemwomore e ketho mar Balaam nikech gihero pesa, omiyo osetiekgi kaachiel gi Kora nikech gisengʼanyo kaka Kora nongʼanyo.
Jogi to yanyo gimoro amora ma ok gingʼeyo to gik ma giketore ni gingʼeyo mana kaka le maonge rieko nyalo timo, mago e gik mabiro tiekogi.

Yie ema nomiyo Nowa owinjo siem mane Nyasaye osiemego kanyise gik mane biro timore mane pok oneno. Nowa nowinjo wach Nyasaye, kopongʼ gi luor, mi nohondho yie mondo otony kaachiel gi joode. Kuom yieneno, nongʼado ne piny bura, kendo nodoko achiel kuom joma Nyasaye oketo kare kuom yie.
Ka gik moko duto nosechan kamano, jodolo ne donjoga e hema ma oko pile mondo giti tichgi mar lemo.
“Un joma tokgi tek, chunyu bor gi Nyasaye kendo udagi winjo wachne! Uchal mana gi kwereu. Usiko utamo Roho Maler tiyo!

Wangʼeyo bende ni chik ok oket ni joma kare, to okete ni joketh chik gi jonjore; gi joma okia Nyasaye, kod joricho, gi joma timbegi ochido, kod joma odagi lemo; bende ni joma nego wuonegi kata minegi. Bende chikno oket ni jonek
Ne asendikonu e barupa motelo ni kik ubedi e kanyakla mar joma terore.
To ka Nyasaye, mane owala mi oketa tenge kaka gir tichne kane pok onywola, kendo mane oluonga kuom ngʼwonone, nohero
Gik ma atimo odhiera ngʼeyo. Nimar ok atim gik ma adwaro, to atimo mana gik ma ok adwar.
To dhiuru nyime kudongo e ngʼwono kod ngʼeyo ma un-go kuom Ruodhwa kendo Jawarwa Yesu Kristo. En ema oyud duongʼ tinende kendo nyaka chiengʼ! Amin.
Wan wafuwo nikech Kristo, to un to uriek ei Kristo! Wan wanyap, to un to uroteke! Un imiyou duongʼ, to wan to ochawa!
Chungʼuru motegno kuom yie ma un-go kendo tameuru, nikech ungʼeyo ni joweteu moyie e piny ngima bende neno chandruok machal gi ma uneno.

Un, wasumbini, luoruru ruodhiu mag pinyni e weche duto kendo kik utim kamano mana sa ma gichungʼ butu ka gingʼiyou kutiyo, ka gima udwaro morogi, to timuru kamano gi chuny ma thuolo kendo kuluoro Ruoth.
“Tunge apargo mane ineno, gin ruodhi apar mapok oyudo pinyruoth to ibiro miyogi teko mar locho kuom sa achiel kende, kaka ruodhi kaachiel gi ondiek malichno.
Roho mwaseyudo ok en roho mar piny, to en Roho moa kuom Nyasaye, mamiyo wangʼeyo mich ma Nyasaye osemiyowa.
Chikuru itu uwinja, un jo-mwandu! Ywaguru kendo gouru nduru nikech masiche mathoth mochomou.

Kik iluor kuom sand ma ibiro yudo machiegni. Adier, anyisou ni Jachien biro tweyo jomoko kuomu e od twech mondo otemugo kendo ubiro yudo sandruok kuom ndalo apar. Bed ja-adiera nyaka kar tho mi anamiyi osimbo mar ngima.
To in, ngʼat Nyasaye, pogri gi mago duto kiketo chunyi kuom ngima makare kod luoro Nyasaye gi yie kod hera kendo kitimo kinda kod muolo.
Usedak e piny-ka kudhialoru e ngima mamalo, usebedo jowuoro mudoko machwe to koro chiengʼ yengʼo osechopo.
Kom duongʼno ne olwor gi kombe moko piero ariyo gangʼwen ma jodongo piero ariyo gangʼwen obedoe. Ne girwakore gi lewni marochere to e wigi negirwake osimbe mag dhahabu.

Miyeuru sand kod ywagruok mangʼeny marom gi duongʼ kod dhialruok mar ngima moyombore mane odakie kendo mane omiyore owuon. Ne osungore kowacho e chunye niya, ‘Abedo kaka ruoth ma dhako, ok an dhako ma chwore otho kendo ok ane gima dimi aywag ngangʼ.’

Un chwo bende nyaka udag gi mondeu kuweyonegi korgi. Migiuru luor kaka chwech mangʼaw kendo kaka jouteu muchamogo mich mar ngima momiu kuom ngʼwono. Kutimo kamano to onge gima biro mono lemou chopo e nyim Nyasaye.
Ok ayie mondo dhako opuonj ji kata obed gi teko ewi ngʼama dichwo; nyaka olingʼ mos,
Nyasaye moseluongou mondo ubedi e lalruok gi Wuode Yesu Kristo Ruodhwa en ja-adiera.
Jowetena, Nyasaye noluongou mondo ubed thuolo. To kik uti gi thuolo ma un-go mondo utim timbe maricho ma ringreu gombo timo. Kar timo kamano, to ngʼato ka ngʼato onego kony nyawadgi kuom hera.
Wuouru kendo timuru gik mutimo kaka joma ibiro ngʼadnigi bura gi Chik achielno mamiyo ji bedo thuolo,
Nitie tije mopogore opogore, to Ruoth achiel ema itiyone.
Gin bende ema kwerewa madongo noa kuomgi, kendo kata mana Kristo, kuom anywolane kaka dhano, bende oa kuomgi; En ma en Nyasaye kuom duto, kendo mipako nyaka chiengʼ! Amin.
Ka isandowa, to mano timorenwa mondo uyud hoch kod warruok; to ka wayudo hoch, to en mana ni mondo Nyasaye okonyu mondo udhil gi sand ma wan bende wayudo.
To Nyasaye owuon ema osemiyo un kod wan wachungʼ motegno kuom Kristo. En ema osewirowa,
Eka dwolno nowuoyo kode kendo mar ariyo niya, “Kik iluong gimoro amora ma Nyasaye osepwodho ni ok ler.”
“To ruodhi mag piny mane oterore kode, kendo bedo kode e ngima moyombore noywage kendo sedo kod nyinge ka gineno yiro madum ka owangʼ.
Yesu nodwoke niya, “Ka ngʼato ohera to obiro rito puonjna, Wuora biro here, kendo wabiro biro ire mi walos kar dakwa kode.
Ma e gima hera en: ok ni wan ema ne wahero Nyasaye, to Nyasaye ema noherowa mokwongo mi nooro Wuode kaka misango mar richowa.
To ka wawuotho e ler, kaka en bende enie ler to wan e lalruok ngʼato gi ngʼato, kendo remb Yesu Wuode pwodhowa kuom richowa duto.
Omiyo koro ok un wasumbini, to un nyithind ot, to nikech un nyithind ot, Nyasaye osemiyo wadoko jocham girkeni.
To kuom Wuowi to owuoye niya, “Lochni nosik nyaka chiengʼ, yaye Nyasaye, kendo tim makare ema nobed kaka ludh loch e pinyruodhi.
Jo-Yahudi nodwoke niya, “Ok wachieli gi kite nikech honni madongo misetimo, to wachieli gi kite nikech iseyanyo Nyasaye. In mana dhano adhanani, ere kaka inyalo ketori ni in Nyasaye?”
To iro mar mach mar sandgino dhi malo nyaka chiengʼ. Jogo malamo ondiek malich kod gima ket kode, kata jogo mondik negi kido mar nyinge, ok noyud yweyo odiechiengʼ kata otieno.”
Emomiyo, ka koro Nyasaye osekechowa momiyowa tijni mondo watim, chunywa ok nyosre.
Omiyo wanyalo wacho gi chir niya, “Jehova Nyasaye e jakonyna omiyo ok analuor, ere gima dhano ditimna?”
Kik ngʼat machamo gik moko duto buon ngʼat ma ok cham, kendo ngʼat ma ok cham gik moko duto bende kik ngʼad bura ne ngʼat machamo, nikech Nyasaye oserwake.
Mad Nyasaye mamiyo ji kinda kendo ma jiwo ji, omi ubed gi chuny achiel e kindu uwegi, kendo kuluwo Kristo Yesu,

En ok ochune ni nyaka otim misango pile pile kaka jodolo madongo mamoko timo, kokuongo gi timo misango mare owuon eka otimo mar joma moko. En to notimo misango ni richogi dichiel kende kane ochiwo ringre owuon.
Ka ngʼato jamoko to oneno owadgi kochando to ok okeche, ere kaka ngʼama kamano nyalo wacho ni en gihera mar Nyasaye?
Wawacho ni wan gi chir kendo dwaher moloyo weyo dak e ringruogni mondo wadag kaachiel gi Ruoth.
Joherana, ajiwou, kaka jowuoth kendo kaka welo e pinyni, mondo uwe gombo maricho mag ringruok makedo gi chunyu.
Chiwuru luor mowinjore ne ji duto. Heruru jowete duto mowar. Luoruru Nyasaye. Miuru ruoth mar piny luor.
Musa ne oparo ni owetene ma jo-Israel ne nyalo neno ni Nyasaye ema notiyo kode mondo ogolgi e twech, to ne ok gineno kamano.
Beduru motangʼ ni guogi ma gin joma timo timbe mamono kendo moramo ni ji nyaka ter nyangu.
Giwacho ni gingʼeyo Nyasaye to gikwedo Nyasaye nogo gi timbegi manono. Gin acheje ma wigi tek kendo ok ginyal timo gimoro amora maber.
Nimar anyalo timo nendgi ni giramo mar tiyo ni Nyasaye, to kata kamano gionge gi ngʼeyo.
en ema olochonwa e chandruok duto mamakowa, mondo wabed gi nyalo mar hoyo joma moko manie chandruok, ka wahoyogi gi hoch ma Nyasaye osehoyowago wan wawegi.
Tem matek mondo ichiwri ne Nyasaye kaka jatich molony ma wiye ok kuodi kendo mapuonjo Wach mar adiera e yo makare.
Obiro sungore kokwedo gimoro amora miluongo ni Nyasaye kata gimoro amora milamo. Bende nohedhre bet kata ei hekalu mar Nyasaye kolandore owuon ni en Nyasaye.
Wuone kik umi nyithindu bedo gi mirima; to ritgiuru maber, kurieyogi kendo upuonjogi kuom Ruoth.
Ooyo, ewi gigi duto wan joloch moloyo nikech Nyasaye mane oherowa.
Ne wapodho piny waduto, eka ne awinjo dwol moro kawuoyo koda gi dho jo-Hibrania ni, ‘Saulo, Saulo, isanda nangʼo? Riwi mabith migweyono biro mana hinyi in iwuon.’
Angʼeyo chandruokni kod dhierni to kata kamano in jamoko. Bende angʼeyo ayany ma joma wuondore ni jo-Yahudi yanyigo to gin mana joma lamo Satan.
Hera ok mor gi gik maricho, to omor gi adiera.
Kuom mano, lonyuru oko kit kethruok gi richo duto, ma kindegi opongʼo piny kendo bolreuru kurwako wach mopidhi e chunyu, manyalo konyou.
An ne achwoyo, to Apolo noolo pi, to Nyasaye ema nomiyo gidongo.
Eka malaika mar ariyo noluwe kawacho niya, “Yaye Babulon dala maduongʼ osepodho piny! Osepodho Piny! En e dhako cha mane omiyo ogendini duto omadho divai mar mer mar terruokne.”
Un osiepena mana kutimo gik ma achikou.
Nyithinda mageno, tangʼuru ni nyiseche manono ma dhano oloso.
Joma kamago ema donjo e miech ji kendo gihoyo mon ma pachgi yomyom mogangore gi kit richo mayoreyore kendo ma gombo maricho ywayo pachgi koni gi koni,
To wanasiki ka wawacho adiera e hera kendo ka wadongo e gik moko duto kuom Kristo ma en ewi ringruok.
Temuru duto munyalo mondo urit achiel mar Roho ka usiko e kwe moriwou kaachiel.
Saulo nopenjo niya, “In ngʼa, Ruoth?” Nodwoke niya, “An Yesu ma isando.
To miuru Kristo duongʼ ei chunyu kaka Ruoth Maler. Beduru moikore kinde duto mar dwoko ngʼato mopenjou gimomiyo un gi geno ma un-gono. To timuru kamano gi muolo kod luor.
“Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, ‘Lony wuoche e tiendi, nikech kama ichungoeni en Kama Ler!
Kuom mano, neuru ni urito gima ne ukwongo winjo nyaka aa chakruok. Ka usiko ukano gima ne uwinjo mokwongo, to ubiro siko e winjruok gi Wuowi kod Wuoro.
Awachonu adier ni ka ngʼato orito wachna, to ok notho nyaka chiengʼ.”
Eka naneno kom mar loch maduongʼ marachar kaachiel gi jal manobedo e komno. Piny gi polo noringo oa e nyime mi olal nono ma ok nonegi kendo.
“Chiemo en mar ich, ich en mar chiemo,” to Nyasaye biro ketho gik moko ariyo duto. Ringruok ok en mar terruok, to en mar miyo Ruoth duongʼ, mana kaka Ruoth bende en mar ringruok.
E kaka un bende nyaka ukwanru ni utho ne richo, to ungima ne Nyasaye ei Kristo Yesu.
Erokamano ni Nyasaye, ma kinde duto telonwa kaka joma oselocho kuom Kristo, kendo ma konyore kodwa kuom keyo tik mamit mar ngʼeyo Kristo.
Puonj mane wayudo kuom Kristo kendo koro wanyisou ema: Nyasaye en ler, kendo mudho onge kuome kata matin.
Joma Wuoro omiya duto biro ira, kendo ngʼato angʼata mobiro ira ok anariembi ngangʼ.
Sikuru kuheroru kaka owete.
Kuom mano onyalo waro chuth joma kadho kuome kasudo ir Nyasaye, nikech ongima nyaka chiengʼ mondo okwanegi Nyasaye.
To ne gikok niya, “Gole e wangʼwa! Gole e wangʼwa! Gure!” Pilato nopenjogi niya, “Udwaro ni agur ruodhu?” Jodolo madongo nodwoke niya, “Wan waonge gi ruoth machielo makmana Kaisar kende.”
Kuom mano, kata sani bende pod nitie jomodongʼ, moyier kuom ngʼwono.
En ema ruodhi mag piny noterore kode, kendo ji duto modak e piny bende osemadho divai mar terruokne mi omer.”
Genreuru ngʼato gi ngʼato gihera mar owete. Ngʼato ka ngʼato mondo odhial nyawadgi moloyo kaka odhialore owuon.
Jogo michiko gi Roho mar Nyasaye gin nyithind Nyasaye.
Eka ranyisi machielo bende nonenore ei polo: ne en thuol mangʼongo, makwar man-gi wiye abiriyo kod tunge apar gi osimbo abiriyo mosidhi e wiyene.

To ka wan nyithind Nyasaye, to mano nyiso ni wan jocham girkeni. Wan jocham girkeni mar Nyasaye kendo wan jocham girkeni kaachiel kod Kristo, ka en adier ni wayie neno masira kode mondo eka wan bende obi omiwa duongʼ kode.
Jodong kanisa morito weche mag kanisa onego yud pok margi nyadiriyo, to moloyo jodongo ma tichgi en yalo kod puonjo wach Nyasaye.

To ji duto ok ongʼeyo wachni. Jomoko pod ongʼiyo gi nyiseche manono ma ka gichamo chiemo makamano to giparo mana ni en motimnigo nyasaye manono misango; to nikech chunygi mar pogo ber gi rach otho, gidoko mochido.
Bedena duto ma ok nyag olemo ongʼado oko, to bede duto manyago olemo olwero mondo omed nyak moloyo.
Kik utimru ruodhi ewi joma oketi e lwetu mondo uriti, to bedne giuru ranyisi maber.
Jowetewa, ok wadwar mondo ubed ka ukia gima timore ne joma osetho, kata mondo ubed gi kuyo ka joma moko, maonge gi geno.
Yie ema nomiyo jo-Israel okalo Nam Makwar mana ka gima gikalo lowo motwo. Jo-Misri to ka notemo timo kamano to ne ginimo giduto.
“Kindeno ema nonywolie Musa, nyathi mane jaber e nyim Nyasaye kendo nopidhe e od wuon-gi kuom dweche adek.
Onyalo dembo joma kia gi joma orwenyo, nikech en owuon bende nyawo obembe.
Otieno chiegni rumo kendo ru piny chiegni. Omiyo waweuru timbe mag mudho, to wamanreuru gi gige lweny mag ler.
Un Ruodhi timneuru wasumbiniu machalre. Kik ubwog-gi, nikech ungʼeyo ni Ruoth motelonegi, kaachiel kodu ni e polo, kendo ok odew wangʼ ngʼato.
Moruru gi joma mor, kendo ywaguru gi joma ywak.
To kuom tamruok mari kod chunyi midagi loko, ikuno mirima mager, ne in iwuon ne odiechieng mirimb Nyasaye, ma buche makare noelie.
Bangʼe jo-Yahudi moko nobiro koa Antiokia kod Ikonio mi gisemo ji odoknigi. Negigoyo Paulo gi kite mi giywaye e lowo nyaka oko mar dala, ka giparo ni osetho.
Bangʼ kane osewacho mano, Yesu nochandore gie chunye mi nohulonigi niya, “Awachonu adier, ni achiel kuomu biro ndhoga.”
To Muma wacho ratiro ni piny duto ni e twech mar richo omiyo joma oyie kuom Yesu Kristo kende ema yudo gino mane Nyasaye osingo.
To ka gisetieko hulo wechegi, ondiek mawuok e bur matut maonge gikone noked kodgi, mi nologi kendo negogi.
Nikech ka wamako geno mane wachakogo matek nyaka giko to wanabed jocham girkeni kaachiel gi Kristo.
To ka Kristo ni eiu, to kata obedo ni ringruok otho nikech richo, to chunyu ngima nikech tim makare.
Bende nitie janabi kata achiel ma kwereu ne ok osando? Neginego nyaka jonabi mane okoro biro mar Ngʼama Kare. To koro usendhoge mi unege.
kod gombo; mer, dwanyruok, gi timbe mamoko mobam machal gi mago. To asiemou kaka nasiemou kinde motelo, ni joma timo timbe ma kamagi ok noyud gweth mar pinyruoth Nyasaye.
Keturu genou kuom ler kapod un kode, mondo mi ubed nyithind ler.” Kane Yesu osetieko wuoyo kodgi, to nowuok owegi kendo nopondonigi.
Notiyo tich mane okete mondo otim gadiera, mana kaka Musa bende notiyo tichne gadiera e od Nyasaye gi chunye duto.
Kuom Yesu Kristo ma Jawarwa Nyasaye noolonwa Roho mogundho,
Kamano bende, e kaka Josef ma Ja-Lawi modak Saipras, mane joote ochako ni Barnaba (ma tiende ni “Ngʼat ma jiwo ji”),
Omiyo kik waol gi timo timbe mabeyo, nikech ka ok waol to wabiro keyo, ka ndalo ochopo.
“Nikech korka chik to ne asetho kuom chik mondo eka abed mangima ne Nyasaye.
Eka nomiya rapim machalo gi luth mar pimo; kendo nowachona niya, “Aa malo idhiyo ipim hekalu mar Nyasaye kod kendo mar misango, kendo ikwan joma lemo kanyo!
Jogi e joma ne ok odwanyore gi mon, to ne giritore maler. Giluwo bangʼ Nyarombo kamoro amora modhiye. Nongʼiewgi kigologi kuom ji migichalo kaka olembe mokwongo chiek michiwo ni Nyasaye kod Nyarombo.
Bonyogo ne chalo gi farese moikore ni lweny. E wigi negirwako gik machalo gi osimbo mag dhahabu, to lend wangʼ-gi ne chalo gi lela wangʼ dhano.
Daguru ka joma ni thuolo, to kik uti gi thuolo ma un-go obed gima uumogo richou, daguru kaka jotich Nyasaye.
nikech mano emomiyo watiyo matek kendo wakedo, ka waketo genowa kuom Nyasaye mangima, ma en Jawar mar ji duto, to moloyo en Jawar joma oyie.
Koro iparo ni ngʼat monyono Wuod Nyasaye piny gi tiende, makawo remo mar singruok mane opwodhego ka gima nono, kendo ma yanyo Roho mar ngʼwono, to biro yudo kum malich machal nade?
Yesu nochako owachonegi kendo niya, “Beduru gi kwe! Mana kaka Wuora oseora e kaka an bende aorou.”
Jogi gin joma keko akeka kendo gin jomany ketho kuom ji; giluwo dwachgi giwegi maricho, bende giwuoyo gi sunga mathoth kuomgi giwegi. Kendo giwuondo ji gi weche mamit mondo giyud gik magidwaro.
Eka ruodhi mag piny, gi ji madongo, kod jotelo mag lweny, gi jo-mwandu, kod joma roteke, kaachiel gi ji duto ma wasumbini, gi joma ni thuolo, giduto ne gipondo e rogo kendo e bwo lwendni mag gode.
To joma luor, gi joma ok oyie kod jo-koko gi jonek kod joma terore, gi jojuogi gi joma lamo nyiseche manono kod jo-miriambo duto, kargi nobed mana ataro mar mach maliel mager, ma en tho mar ariyo!”
Koro pod irito angʼo? Aa malo mondo obatisi, mondo olwokni richoni, kiluongo nying Ruoth Yesu.’
Yie wigi ne chalo gi yie wi mon, kendo lekegi ne chalo gi leke sibuoche.
To jatich Ruoth ok owinjore bed makwiny, to onego obed mangʼwon gi ji duto kendo onego obed japuonj molony ma hore mos.
Nikech kata obedo ni aonge kodu kuom ringruok, to an kodu kuom chuny, kendo amor mar neno kaka uchanoru maber kendo kaka yieu ochungʼ motegno kuom Kristo.
Nikech wangʼ Jehova Nyasaye ni kuom joma kare kendo ite winjo lamogi, to Jehova Nyasaye mon gi joma timo gik maricho.”

Owetewa ma Ruoth ohero, onego wadwokne Nyasaye erokamano kinde duto ka waparou nikech Nyasaye noyierou nyaka aa chakruok mondo owaru komiyo ngimau doko maler kuom teko mar Roho Maler kaachiel gi yie muyiego kuom adiera.

We ngʼat matimo richo odhi nyime kod timo richo; kendo ngʼat ma chunye ochido odhi nyime timo timbe mochido; to ngʼat matimo tim makare bende odhi nyime gi timo tim makare, to ngʼat maler odhi nyime gibedo maler.”
Petro nodwokogi niya, “Weuru richo kendo obatisu ngʼato ka ngʼato, e nying Yesu Kristo, mondo owenu richou. Ka mano otimore, to ubiro nwangʼo Roho Maler kaka mich.
Neuru ni onge ngʼama chulo rach kuom rach motimne, to temuru mondo kinde duto utim maber ne joweteu kendo ne ji mamoko bende.

Chwo bende noluwo mana yo machalre; kar riwruok gi mon e yo mowinjore, to dendgi noowore gi gombo chwo wetegi. Chwo notimo timbe dwanyruok gi chwo wetegi, kendo timgino nomiyo giyudo kum e dendgi giwegi mowinjore gi kethogino.
Omiyo un bende beduru abeda mamor mana kaka an bende amor.
Koro lokreuru uwe richou, udog ir Nyasaye, mondo richou owenu, eka Ruoth noduog chunyu mi uyud kwe,
Dhorangeyene ok nolor odiechiengʼ moro amora, to otieno bende ok nobedie ngangʼ.
Ngʼato angʼata mochamo ringra kendo omadho remba nigi ngima mochwere, kendo abiro chiere chiengʼ giko piny.
Yesu nodwoke niya, “Ok dibedo gi teko moro amora kuoma ka dine bed ni ok omiyigo koa malo. Kuom mano ngʼama noketa e lweti nigi ketho maduongʼ moloyo richo misetimo.”
Mano e kaka yie bende chalo: ka oonge gi tim to en yie motho.

Gima Chik ne ok nyal timo nikech ringruok manyap mar dhano, ema Nyasaye notimo kuom oro Wuode owuon, e kido mar dhano ma jaricho mondo obed misango magolo richo. Osetimo kamano mondo omi bura olo richo,
To kata ka ochuno ni nyaka une sand kuom gima kare mutimo, to un joma ogwedhi. “Kik uluor gik ma giluoro, kendo kata bwok kik ubwogi.”
Un wuone, kik umi nyithindu chuny lit, nono to chunygi biro jok.

Nokok gi dwol maduongʼ kowacho niya, “Yaye Babulon dala maduongʼ osepodho piny! Osepodho piny! Osedoko kar dak mar jochiende, kendo odoko gunda ma chuny duto mochido odakie, kaachiel gi winy duto ma ok ler kendo makwero.
Ja-miriambo to kara en ngʼa? En ngʼama wacho ni Yesu ok en Kristo. Ngʼatno e Jasik Kristo, nikech odagi Wuoro kaachiel gi Wuowi.
Emomiyo ngʼama ochamo makatini kata ometho e kikombeni e yo ma ok owinjore, bura biro loyo kodoko jaketho kuom ringre Ruoth gi rembe.
In ngʼat mofuwoni idwaro mondo omed nyisi kaka yie maonge tim en gima nono?
Omiyo Judas nobiro e puodhono, kotelone migawo mar jolweny kod jotelo moko ma noa ir jodolo madongo gi jo-Farisai. Negitingʼo toje gi teyni kod gige lweny.
Ruoth en ja-adiera, omiyo obiro miyou teko kendo obiro ritou e lwet Ngʼama Rach.
To kane owite oko, nyar Farao ne okwanye mi opidhe mana kaka nyathine owuon.
Bangʼe malaika nokawo tap ubani, mi opongʼo gi mach moa e kendo mar misango, eka nobole e piny. Bangʼ mano polo nomil malich kariadore matek ka mor, kendo piny noyiengni.

Mano osetimore nikech ogendini e pinje duto osemadho divai makech mar terruokne. Ruodhi mag piny oseterore kode, kendo jo-ohala mag piny bende osedoko jo-mwandu nikech ohala mangimane mamalo osekelonegi.”
Mano e gima nomiyo jo-Yahudi omaka e laru mar hekalu kendo negitemo mondo ginega.
Ginitamre winjo adiera ka gichiko itgi ni sigendini manono.
To kata kamano pod nitie jomoko kuomu ma ok oyie.” Yesu nowacho kamano nikech nosengʼeyo nyaka aa chakruok joma ok oyie kaachiel gi ngʼat mabiro ndhoge.
Yesu nodwoke niya, “En ngʼama abiro miyo makatini bangʼ ka aselute e kado.” Eka, bangʼ luto makati e kado, nomiye Judas Iskariot wuod Simon.
To in Timotheo, rit maber gima oseketi e lweti maber mondo iriti. Pogri gi mbekni manono mag piny gi gwenyo wach ma ji okawo ni rieko to ok gin rieko.

To jo-Yahudi mamoko ne nyiego omako; omiyo negidhi gichoko acheje moko mane bayo e chiro kanyo, eka negichoko oganda maduongʼ mar joma achejego, kendo negichako lweny e dalano. Ne gimwomore e od Jason, ka gimanyo Paulo gi Sila, mondo gigolgi oko ni oganda.

Ka ngʼato oneno wadgi katimo richo ma ok tere e tho, to owinjore olamne mondo Nyasaye omi ngʼatno ngima. Awuoyo kuom joma richogi ok tergi e tho. To nitie richo matero ji e tho; ma ok awach ni olamie Nyasaye.
Awachonu adier, ni ngʼato angʼata morwako ngʼama aoro, orwaka, kendo ngʼama orwaka orwako jal ma noora.”
Emomiyo wagouru erokamano ne Nyasaye nikech wasenwangʼo pinyruoth manyien ma ok nyal yiengni. Chunywa mondo omi Nyasaye duongʼ kod luor, kendo walame e yo modwaro, ka wapongʼ gi kibaji,

To jo-Yahudi moko mane wuotho koni gi koni kagolo jochiende notemo tiyo gi nying Ruoth Yesu mondo giriemb jochiende kuom ji. Ne gitemo wacho niya, “E nying Yesu ma Paulo yalo, wachiki mondo iwuog oko!”
to Paulo noyiero Sila gidhigo, ka owete oketogi e bwo ngʼwono mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
Omiyo ritreuru mondo gima usetiyone kik lalnu, eka unuyud mich magu duto.
Jogi nigi teko mar loro polo mondo koth kik chue e ndalo ma gihuloe wach. To bende gin gi teko mar loko pi obed remo kendo kelo tuoche yembe mopogore opogore e piny e kinde mora amora magidwaro.
Ionge gi migawo moro amora e tijwani, kendo kwan-ni onge e iye, nikech chunyi ok nikare e nyim Nyasaye.
Giga duto gin magi, kendo gigi duto gin maga, kendo aseyudo duongʼ kuomgi.
Ji duto osebaro, giduto gisedoko joma nono; onge ngʼama timo maber, onge kata achiel.”
Kik utim gimoro amora mondo upiem gi ji kata mondo unyisru ne ji, to beduru joma obolore, ka kinde duto ukwano joma moko kaka joma beyo moloyou.
to e dier rachungi teynigo ne nitie ngʼato machalo gi wuod dhano morwakore gi kandho mochopo nyaka e tiende piny, kendo kotweyo kore gi okanda mar dhahabu.
Gik ma Nyasaye okwedo ok nochak obedie. Kom duongʼ mar loch Nyasaye gi mar Nyarombo ema nobedie ei dalano, to jotichne notine.
Giko gik moko duto chiegni. Emomiyo beduru gi paro maler kendo ritreuru mondo ulam.
Kane gia Atalia, negikwangʼ mi gidok Antiokia, kuma ne giyudo e pwoch kuom tich maber mane gisetimo kuom ngʼwono mar Nyasaye.
To ka ikendo, to ok itimo richo; kata ka nyako okendi bende ok otimo richo. To joma okendo gi mokendi biro neno chandruok mathoth e ngimani, to adwaro ni akonyu mondo kik une chandruokni.
Nikech wasigu mwakedogo ok gin dhano, to wakedo gi jotelo, kod ruodhi mag piny motimo mudhoni, kaachiel gi lang chuny maricho modak e kor polo.
Ka ngʼato kuomu ochando rieko to okwa Nyasaye, ma jachiwo maber ne ji duto kendo nomiye maonge kiawa.
Kik utam Roho Maler tiyo e dieru,
Ne olos hema ma opog iye ariyo. Kama ikwongo donjoe ne iluongo ni Kama Ler, kendo kanyo noketie rachung taya gi mesa moketie makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile.

To angʼadoni rieko mondo ibi ingʼiew kuoma dhahabu mopwodhi gi mach mondo ibed jamoko. Ngʼiew lewni marochere kuoma mondo irwakrigo oumni dugi makeloni wichkuot. Ngʼiew yath kuoma mondo ithiedh-go wangʼi mondo inen.
Andikonu wechegi, un joma oyie kuom nying Wuod Nyasaye, mondo ungʼe ni un gi ngima mochwere.
Ngʼat ma wuoyo kuome owuon timo kamano mondo oyud duongʼ en owuon, to ngʼat matiyo mondo Nyasaye mane oore ema oyud duongʼ, en ja-adiera, kendo onge miriambo moro amora kuome.
To mwandu mawan-goni watingʼo e agulni mag lowo, mondo oyangre ni teko maduongʼ mawan-goni oa kuom Nyasaye, to ok oa kuomwa wawegi.
Kik uchul kuoro, osiepena, to weuru thuolo ne mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar ondiki niya, “An ema nachul kuor; abiro chulo,” Jehova Nyasaye owacho.
Yesu nodwokogi niya, “Ka dipo ni amiyora duongʼ kenda, to duongʼna onge tich. Wuora, ma un bende uluongo ni Nyasachuno ema miya duongʼ.
Kik iketh tich Nyasaye nikech wach chiemo. Chiemo duto ler, to ok ber mondo ngʼato ocham gimoro amora mamiyo ngʼat machielo podho.
Negikawo ringre Yesu mi giwiro gi modhigo bangʼe giboye gi lewni marep-rep molir olir, kaka chik jo-Yahudi mar yiko ngʼato dwaro.
Chunyu ne sandore kaachiel gi joma otwe nikech Kristo, kendo numor kimayou giu githuon nikech nungʼeyo ni un uwegi un gi mwandu mabeyo moloyo kendo mosiko.
“Nyasaye osekelo ni jo-Israel Jawar ma en Yesu, koa e koth Daudi, mana kaka nosingore ni notim.
To en mana kaka ondiki niya, “Onge wangʼ moseneno, kata it mosewinjo, kata paro mosengʼeyo gima Nyasaye oseiko ne joma ohere.”
Ka Roho mar Jal mane ochiero Yesu oa kuom joma otho odak eiu, to En owuon mane ochiero Kristo oa kuom joma otho obiro chiwo ngima ni ringreu matho, nikech Roho modak eiu.
To Roho owuon timo neno kaachiel gi chunywa ni wan nyithind Nyasaye.
Kik uwuondru kendu, Nyasaye ok nyal wuondi. Ngʼeuru gima ichwoyo ema ikayo.
Kuom mano, neye ngʼwono kod gero mar Nyasaye: oger gi joma ne opodho, to onyiso ngʼwonone ne un, to mana ka usiko e ngʼwonone; nono to un bende ibiro ngʼadou oko.
Emomiyo horeuru mos, jowetena, nyaka chop Ruoth duogi. Neuru kaka japur rito puothe mondo onyagne cham mokonyorego, kendo kaka ohore mos korito kodh opon gi kodh chwiri.
Mad Ruoth Nyasaye okech jood Onesiforo nikech nosiko kokonyo chunya kendo wiye ne ok okuot koda kata kane an e od twech.
Omiyo koro nyithinda mageno, sikuru kuome mondo ka ofwenyore to wabed gi chir kendo maonge wichkuot e nyime ka obiro.
Omiyo akwayou ni mondo uwuothi kuom Roho, eka ok ubi timo gik ma ringreu dwaro.
Wach mar adier mowinjore ji oyiego chuth en ni Kristo Yesu nobiro e piny mondo owar joricho, to an e jaricho marachie moloyo joricho duto.
Mogik, beduru motegno kuom Ruoth, kendo kuom tekone maduongʼ.
Omiyo, ka iparo ni ichungʼ motegno bed motangʼ, nono to ipodho!
nikech kuom misango achiel kende, omiyo joma opwodhi odoko joma longʼo mi gibedo joma kare chuth.
Kane jo-Yahudi owinjo wachno, negichako gikwanyo kite mondo gichielego,
To adwaro mondo ungʼe ni Kristo ewi dichwo ka dichwo, kendo ni dichwo ewi dhako, to Nyasaye ewi Kristo.
Moko ne ojar kendo ochwadi gi del, to moko bende noketi e od twech.
Genowano osiro chunywa ka loch mogur motegno ma ok yiengni kendo ma gimoro ok nyal donje mi kethi. Odonjo nyaka ei kama ler mar lemo manie tok pasia,
Kwedreuru chuth gi timbe mag mudho maonge ohala kendo hulgiuru e lela.

Owetena, kik uketh nying joweteu. Ngʼato angʼata ma wuoyo marach kuom nyawadgi kata mangʼado ni nyawadgi bura nyaka ngʼe ni Chik ema owuoyo kuome marach kendo ongʼadone bura. To ngʼat mangʼado ni Chik bura ok orito Chik nikech osedoko ngʼama ngʼadone bura.
Dhorangeye apar gariyogo ne gin kite mag lulu ma nengogi tek, kendo dhorangach ka dhorangach nolos gi lulu achiel achiel moriwore. Yor dalano ne dhahabu lilo marieny maler ka kio.
To Kristo en ja-adiera kaka jatend od Wuon mare. To wan e jood Nyasaye, ka wamako matek chir kod geno ma wan-go.
Hera nyaka bed mar adier. Beduru mosin gi timbe maricho; padreuru kuom gik mabeyo.

E sa nogo piny noyiengni matek, mi achiel kuom apar mar bath dalano nomukore mogore piny, kendo ji alufu abiriyo notho e yiengni mar pinyno to joma nodongʼ nobwok malich, kendo negimiyo Nyasach Polo duongʼ!
To jathek ok chungʼ kar ngʼat achiel; to Nyasaye to en achiel.
Pilato nowachone niya, “Idagi wuoyo koda nangʼo? Bende ingʼeyo ni an gi teko ma anyalo gonyigo kata gurigo?”
Kama noyudo ngʼatno somo ndiko kama wacho ni: “Notere kar thone mana ka rombo mitero kar yengʼo, kendo nolingʼ ka nyarombo manie lwet ngʼama ngʼado yiere, omiyo en bende ne ok otingʼo dhoge.
To achien jo-Israel nokwayo mondo omigi ruoth, mi Nyasaye nomiyogi Saulo wuod Kish, ma ja-dhood Benjamin. Saulo nobedo ruodh pinyno kuom higni piero angʼwen.
Nikech nitie ji mangʼeny ma jongʼanyo, ma gin mana jothor wach kendo jowuond ji, to moloyo jogo moter nyangu ma gin jo-Yahudi moyie.
Sukano notingʼo kit le man-gi tiende angʼwen duto, kod le mamol duto mag piny kod koth winy duto mafuyo e kor polo.
Asemiyogi duongʼ mane imiya, mondo gibed achiel kaka wan achiel,
Weche mane iwinjo kuoma, ritgi kaka ranyisi mar puonj maber, kod yie gihera kuom Kristo Yesu.
